atk-s0504a:121_4: Yasmā pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
atk-s0504a:121_6: Atha vā bhagavato sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
atk-s0504a:121_8: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā honti.
atk-s0504a:121_10: Tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:121_11: Attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:121_12: Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
atk-s0504a:121_13: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasantāne upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti.
atk-s0504a:121_15: paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:121_16: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
atk-s0504a:122_1: anupacitasambhārehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhā ca.
atk-s0504a:122_2: Tasmā tehi catūhi gambhīrabhāvehi yuttanti dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhagambhīraṃ.
atk-s0504a:123_0: Eko eva bhagavato dhammadesanāghoso ekasmiṃ khaṇe pavattamāno nānābhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ attano attano bhāsāvasena
atk-s0504a:123_1: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ gahaṇūpago hutvā atthādhigamāya hoti.
atk-s0504a:123_2: Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvoti sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:124_2: na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento –
atk-s0504a:124_4: mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0504a:125_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0504a:125_8: “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0504a:125_9: ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti –
atk-s0504a:125_11: tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva,
atk-s0504a:125_17: sā na sabbākārena sakkā viññātunti vuttovāyamattho.
atk-s0504a:125_19: Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ ekavisayattā.
atk-s0504a:125_20: Itarathā hi thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamatthoti vā āpajjeyyāti.
atk-s0504a:126_5: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti attho.
atk-s0504a:126_9: Idha pana “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0504a:127_0: Ettha ca yo paro na hoti,
atk-s0504a:127_1: so attāti evaṃ vattabbe niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte sakasantāne vattanato tividhopi me-
atk-s0504a:128_4: saddo eva taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggopi udāharīyati.
atk-s0504a:129_7: Idha panassa “sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti vā “upadhāraṇa”nti vā attho. Me-
atk-s0504a:129_8: saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “iti me sutaṃ,
atk-s0504a:129_10: Mamāti atthe sati “iti mama sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhāraṇa”nti attho.
atk-s0504a:130_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu yasmā sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena itisaddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:130_5: Yathā hi sutaṃ sutamevāti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0504a:130_6: taṃ sammā sutaṃ anūnaggahaṇaṃ aviparītaggahaṇañca hotīti.
atk-s0504a:130_7: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti,
atk-s0504a:130_8: yasmā sutanti etassa asutaṃ na hotīti ayamattho,
atk-s0504a:130_17: Avadhāraṇatthe vā itisadde ayamatthayojanāti tadapekkhassa suta-
atk-s0504a:130_20: Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:131_0: Tathā itīti sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇato nānappakārena ārammaṇe
atk-s0504a:131_5: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā kāraṇabhūtāya mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0504a:132_2: Tasmā itisaddena sakalampi sutaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:132_7: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati.
atk-s0504a:133_0: Tathā itīti yassa cittasantānassa nānārammaṇappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:133_2: Itīti hi ayaṃ ākārapaññatti dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattiākāraṃ upādāya paññāpetabbasabhāvattā.
atk-s0504a:133_5: Sotabbo hi dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:133_6: Ettāvatā nānappakārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattu visaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:134_1: Sutānañhi dhammānaṃ gahitākārassa nidassanassa avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanabhāvena itisaddena tadākārādidhāraṇassa
atk-s0504a:134_4: Puggalavādinopi hi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā na hotīti.
atk-s0504a:134_9: mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena laddhassavanakiccavohārena sutanti.
atk-s0504a:135_0: Tathā itīti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0504a:135_1: Sabbassa hi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādīsu chasveva paññattīsu avarodho,
atk-s0504a:135_3: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti.
atk-s0504a:135_4: So rūpasaddādiko ruppanānubhavanādiko ca paramatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena vijjati.
atk-s0504a:135_5: Yo pana itīti ca meti ca vuccamāno ākārādiaparamatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena anupalabbhamāno avijjamānapaññatti nāma,
atk-s0504a:135_7: yaṃ itīti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha.
atk-s0504a:136_0: Tathā itīti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādīnaṃ paccāmasanavasena.
atk-s0504a:136_1: Meti sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe karaṇādivisesavisiṭṭhe upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0504a:136_4: tatiyanti ādiko viya paṭhamādiṃ nissāya “yaṃ na diṭṭhamutaviññātanirapekkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:136_5: taṃ suta”nti viññeyyattā diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbo hoti.
atk-s0504a:136_6: Asutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsitoyamatthoti.
atk-s0504a:137_0: Ettha ca itīti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:137_1: Paṭividdhā hi atthassa pakāravisesā itīti idha āyasmatā ānandena paccāmaṭṭhā,
atk-s0504a:137_4: lobhappahānādivasena nānappakārā duppaṭividdhā ca suttatthā niddisīyanti.
atk-s0504a:137_5: Sutanti vacanena asammosaṃ dīpeti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:137_6: na so kālantare mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0504a:137_7: Iccassa asammohena sammohābhāvena paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi,
atk-s0504a:137_11: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0504a:137_12: paññā tattha guṇībhūtā hoti paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
atk-s0504a:137_14: Atthassa hi paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro gambhīroti paññāya byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0504a:137_15: sati tattha guṇībhūtā hoti satiyā pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
atk-s0504a:138_2: Tena vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ upari vakkhamānānaṃ nānappakārappaṭivedhajotakānaṃ aviparītasaddhammavisayattā.
atk-s0504a:138_3: Na hi ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedho sambhavati.
atk-s0504a:138_5: nidānapucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ na samādhānamantarena sambhavati vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato.
atk-s0504a:138_6: Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0504a:138_9: sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:138_12: Na hi vikkhittacitto saddhammaṃ sotuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0504a:138_13: na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:139_3: Yasmā ca so bhagavato vacanassa atthabyañjanappabhedaparicchedavasena sakalasāsanasampatiogāhanena niravasesaparahitapāripūrikāraṇabhūto
atk-s0504a:139_4: evaṃbhaddako ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattano pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti,
atk-s0504a:139_5: tasmā itīti iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano dīpeti,
atk-s0504a:139_7: Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:139_9: sammā paṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño visuddhāsayo hoti,
atk-s0504a:139_13: seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti “katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0504a:139_17: Patirūpadesavāsena hi sappurisūpanissayena ca sādhūnaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanenapi visuddhappayogo hoti.
atk-s0504a:139_19: pubbe eva taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ visodhitattā payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattisiddhi.
atk-s0504a:139_20: Suparisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hoti.
atk-s0504a:139_21: Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa vacanaṃ aruṇuggamanaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato,
atk-s0504a:139_23: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento iti me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:140_1: itīti iminā pubbe vuttanayena nānappakārappaṭivedhadīpakena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:140_2: Sutanti iminā itisaddasannidhānato vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sotabbabhedappaṭivedhadīpakena dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:140_3: Itīti ca idaṃ vuttanayeneva yonisomanasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:140_7: ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anupekkhitā anussavākāraparivitakkasahitāya dhammanijjhānakkhantibhūtāya
atk-s0504a:140_8: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
atk-s0504a:140_9: ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā nayena suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā paṭividdhā attano paresañca hitasukhāvahā hontīti.
atk-s0504a:140_10: Suttanti idaṃ savanayogaparidīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:140_12: Tadubhayenapi dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti.
atk-s0504a:140_13: Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabbo.
atk-s0504a:141_0: Iti me sutanti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0504a:141_5: tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti,
atk-s0504a:142_0: Apica iti me sutanti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimassavanaṃ vivaranto sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ
atk-s0504a:142_1: mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyino sīhanādanādino sabbasattuttamassa
atk-s0504a:142_2: dhammissarassa dhammarājassa dhammādhipatino dhammadīpassa dhammasaraṇassa saddhammavaracakkavattino
atk-s0504a:142_4: Na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbāti sabbadevamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assaddhiyaṃ vināseti,
atk-s0504a:145_1: “kasmā panettha yathā aññesu suttesu ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ,
atk-s0504a:145_2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā’tiādinā kāladese apadisitvāva nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:145_6: Idañhi nidānaṃ na āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamaṃ bhāsitaṃ khujjuttarāya pana bhagavatā upāsikāsu bahussutabhāvena
atk-s0504a:145_7: etadagge ṭhapitāya sekkhappaṭisambhidāppattāya ariyasāvikāya sāmāvatippamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ
atk-s0504a:146_1: ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko haṃsavatiyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0504a:146_2: Athekadivasaṃ haṃsavatiyaṃ ekā kuladhītā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ gacchantīhi upāsikāhi saddhiṃ ārāmaṃ gatā.
atk-s0504a:146_3: Satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ bahussutānaṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikāraṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0504a:146_4: Satthāpi naṃ byākāsi “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ aggā bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:146_5: Tassā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā puna manussesūti evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantiyā kappasatasahassaṃ atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0504a:146_6: Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sā devalokato cavitvā ghosakaseṭṭhissa gehe dāsiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0504a:146_8: Sā jātakāle khujjā ahosīti khujjuttarātveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0504a:146_9: Sā aparabhāge ghosakaseṭṭhinā rañño utenassa sāmāvatiyā dinnakāle tassā paricārikabhāvena dinnā rañño utenassa antepure vasati.
atk-s0504a:147_0: Tena ca samayena kosambiyaṃ ghosakaseṭṭhikukkuṭaseṭṭhipāvārikaseṭṭhino bhagavantaṃ uddissa tayo vihāre
atk-s0504a:147_1: kāretvā janapadacārikaṃ carante tathāgate kosambinagaraṃ sampatte buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0504a:147_6: aññesampi okāsaṃ dassāmā”ti kosambinagaravāsinopi janassa okāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:147_7: Tato paṭṭhāya nāgarā vīthisabhāgena gaṇasabhāgena mahādānaṃ denti.
atk-s0504a:147_8: Athekadivasaṃ satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mālākārajeṭṭhakassa gehe nisīdi.
atk-s0504a:147_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe khujjuttarā sāmāvatiyā pupphāni gahetuṃ aṭṭha kahāpaṇe ādāya taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0504a:147_11: ajja tuyhaṃ pupphāni dātuṃ khaṇo natthi,
atk-s0504a:147_14: evaṃ ito paresaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇato muccissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0504a:147_15: Tato khujjuttarā buddhānaṃ bhattagge veyyāvaccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0504a:147_16: Sā satthārā upanisinnakathāvasena kathitaṃ sabbameva dhammaṃ uggaṇhi,
atk-s0504a:148_0: Sā aññesu divasesu cattārova kahāpaṇe datvā pupphāni gahetvā gacchati,
atk-s0504a:148_1: tasmiṃ pana divase diṭṭhasaccabhāvena parasantake cittaṃ anuppādetvā aṭṭhapi kahāpaṇe datvā pacchiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0504a:148_4: tvaṃ aññesu divasesu na bahūni pupphāni āharasi,
atk-s0504a:148_7: Sā musā vattuṃ abhabbatāya atīte attanā kataṃ anigūhitvā sabbaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0504a:148_8: Atha “kasmā ajja bahūni āharasī”ti ca vuttā “ajjāhaṃ sammāsambuddhassa dhammaṃ sutvā amataṃ sacchākāsiṃ,
atk-s0504a:148_11: ettakaṃ kālaṃ tayā gahite kahāpaṇe dehī”ti atajjetvā pubbahetunā codiyamānā “amma,
atk-s0504a:148_13: amhepi pāyehī”ti vatvā “tena hi maṃ nhāpehī”ti vutte soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā dve maṭṭhasāṭake dāpesi.
atk-s0504a:148_14: Sā ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā āsane nisīditvā vicitrabījaniṃ ādāya nīcāsanesu nisinnāni
atk-s0504a:148_15: pañca mātugāmasatāni āmantetvā sekhappaṭisambhidāsu ṭhatvā satthārā desitaniyāmeneva tāsaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0504a:148_18: ajja paṭṭhāya tvaṃ kiliṭṭhakammaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0504a:148_19: amhākaṃ mātuṭṭhāne ācariyaṭṭhāne ca patiṭṭhāhī”ti garuṭṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0504a:149_1: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhidhītā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0504a:149_2: Ekāya khīṇāsavattheriyā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gatāya “etaṃ me ayye,
atk-s0504a:149_4: Therīpi “adentiyā mayi āghātaṃ uppādetvā niraye nibbattissati,
atk-s0504a:149_6: nirayasantāpato dāsibhāvo seyyo”ti anuddayaṃ paṭicca tassā vacanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0504a:149_7: Sā tena kammena pañca jātisatāni paresaṃ dāsīyeva hutvā nibbatti.

atk-s0504a:285_0: Dassanagamanantarāyakaraṇato vā vijjācaraṇavipakkhato dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:285_1: Vijjāya hi ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā avijjā nibbānadassanassa aviparītadassanassa ca visesato antarāyakarā,

atk-s0504a:286_1: Visesena hi sammohassa balavabhāvato avijjākhettaṃ atīto addhā,
atk-s0504a:286_7: Teneva tāsaṃ pubbantāharaṇena aparantapaṭisandhānena cassa yathākkamaṃ mūlakāraṇatā dassitāti veditabbanti.
atk-s0504a:287_1: Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ appaṭikāradukkhābhibhūtampi sattaṃ

atk-s0504a:287_7: Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi,

atk-s0504a:295_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomappaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū
atk-s0504a:295_1: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati –

atk-s0504a:299_2: Tena patthayamānassāti taṃ yogakkhemaṃ gantukāmassa tanninnassa tappoṇassa tappabbhārassāti attho.
atk-s0504a:299_3: Viharatoti ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harato.
atk-s0504a:299_4: Atha vā “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti adhimuccanto saddhāya viharatī”tiādinā niddesanayena cettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:299_8: Na aññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmīti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0504a:299_10: ajjhattaṃ attano santāne samuṭṭhitaṃ kāraṇanti katvā aññaṃ ekakāraṇampi na samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bahūpakāraṃ,
atk-s0504a:299_14: aniccānulomikena vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro.
atk-s0504a:300_4: Tattha yoniso manasi karontoti “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-s0504a:300_7: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti catūsu ariyasaccesu yoniso manasikāraṃ pavattento.
atk-s0504a:301_1: yadipi idaṃ suttaṃ avisesena sekkhapuggalavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0504a:301_3: Yo catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko yogāvacaro “taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:301_6: nirodhasampāpako maggo”ti evaṃ pubbe eva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0504a:301_7: So aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷho samāno tebhūmake khandhe “idaṃ dukkha”nti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0504a:301_8: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0504a:301_10: Yā panāyaṃ tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavikā taṇhā,

atk-s0504a:301_18: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0504a:302_5: āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena cattāri mahābhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho”ti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0504a:302_6: Taṃ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasikadhamme “ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā”ti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0504a:302_8: Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgā honti.
atk-s0504a:302_12: So tesaṃ paccayānañca paccayuppannānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā “ime dhammā ahutvā bhavanti,
atk-s0504a:303_0: Evaṃ tilakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanto udayabbayañāṇuppattiyā uppanne obhāsādike vipassanupakkilese ‘amaggo’ti
atk-s0504a:303_1: udayabbayañāṇameva “ariyamaggassa upāyabhūto pubbabhāgamaggo”ti maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā puna udayabbayañāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:303_2: paṭipāṭiyā bhaṅgañāṇādīni ca uppādento sotāpattimaggādayo pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0504a:303_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0504a:303_6: samudayaṃ pahānappaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ akusalaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0504a:303_7: nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ kusalaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0504a:303_9: tasmiñca bhāvite sabbepi kusalā anavajjabodhipakkhiyadhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0504a:303_10: Evaṃ yoniso manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0504a:304_0: Yoniso manasikāroti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – sikkhati,
atk-s0504a:304_4: Tassa sekhassa bhikkhuno uttamatthassa arahattassa pattiyā adhigamāya yathā yoniso manasikāro,
atk-s0504a:304_5: evaṃ bahukāro bahūpakāro añño koci dhammo natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a:304_6: Yasmā yoniso upāyena manasikāraṃ purakkhatvā padahaṃ catubbidhasammappadhānavasena padahanto,
atk-s0504a:304_7: khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe saṃkilesavaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhayaṃ pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇe adhigaccheyya,
atk-s0504a:307_3: hitassa vidhātā sabbākārena upakārako mitto hoti,
atk-s0504a:307_6: Tatrāyaṃ kalyāṇamitto pakatiyā saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0504a:307_8: tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitasukhesitaṃ na pariccajati,
atk-s0504a:307_9: sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti garu ca bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0504a:307_10: sutasampattiyā khandhāyatanasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādikānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti,
atk-s0504a:307_11: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0504a:307_12: vīriyasampattiyā attano paresañca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ āraddhavīriyo hoti,
atk-s0504a:307_13: satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitassati hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā,
atk-s0504a:307_16: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto paññāya sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0504a:307_17: samādhinā tattha abyaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitato nisedhetvā ekantahite niyojeti.
atk-s0504a:309_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:310_3: kusalaṃ bhāvetīti kalyāṇamitto puggalo kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya kammassakatāñāṇaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0504a:310_6: Taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati,

atk-s0504a:312_12: Evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī’.
atk-s0504a:313_1: kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa ‘yaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharissati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ

atk-s0504a:314_2: udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā”’ti.
atk-s0504a:316_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti,
atk-s0504a:317_0: Tena vuttaṃ – “kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
atk-s0504a:318_0: Gāthāya sappatissoti patissavasaṅkhātena saha patissenāti sappatisso,

atk-s0504a:318_17: Iti imesu dvīsu suttesu ariyamaggādhigamassa satthārā padhānaṅgaṃ nāma gahitanti veditabbaṃ.

atk-s0504a:321_18: Ye panassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa laddhiṃ rocetvā tatheva paggayha ṭhitā saṅghe bhijjante bhinne ca samanuññā ahesuṃ,

atk-s0504a:322_0: Devadattopi na cirasseva rogābhibhūto bāḷhagilāno maraṇakāle “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti mañcakasivikāya
atk-s0504a:322_1: nīyamāno jetavanapokkharaṇitīre ṭhapito pathaviyā vivare dinne patitvā avīcimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0504a:322_2: yojanasatiko cassa attabhāvo ahosi kappaṭṭhiyo tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi ayasūlehi vinividdho.

atk-s0504a:323_2: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti ettha bhedasaṃvattanikesu bhaṇḍanādīsu saṅghe uppannesupi “dhammo adhammo”tiādīsu

atk-s0504a:323_5: salākāya pana gāhitāya cattāro vā atirekā vā yadā āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā saṅghakammaṃ vā karonti,

atk-s0504a:324_15: Nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0504a:324_17: Ye hi ariyasukhato viraddhā taṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā,
atk-s0504a:324_19: ariyasukhato ca uttariṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthi.

atk-s0504a:326_5: Bhedakaravatthūhi saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti adhammaṭṭho.

atk-s0504a:392_7: Dukkhassantakaro hotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro pariyosānakaro hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0504a:392_8: Sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā anupubbena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā niravasesānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khepanāti arahattaphaleneva desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0504a:395_4: Te hatalābhasakkārā nippabhā nittejā issāpakatā ciñcamāṇavikaṃ nāma paribbājikaṃ uyyojesuṃ – “ehi,
atk-s0504a:395_7: Sā bhagavantaṃ catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desentaṃ upagantvā abhūtena abbhācikkhitvā sakkenassā abhūtabhāve
atk-s0504a:395_8: pakāsite mahājanena “dhī kāḷakaṇṇī”ti vihārato nikkaḍḍhāpitā pathaviyā vivare dinne avīcijālānaṃ indhanaṃ
atk-s0504a:395_12: ciñcamāṇavikā evaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhūtena akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti.
atk-s0504a:395_15: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0504a:395_17: pubbepi sā maṃ abhūtena akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattāyevā”ti mahāpadumajātakampi vitthāretvā upari dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:395_18: desento imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā “ekadhammaṃ atītassā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0504a:396_1: Atītassāti yā sā aṭṭha anariyavohāre vajjetvā aṭṭhasu ariyavohāresu patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ “saccaṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0504a:396_6: Sampajānamusāvādī hi puggalo kiñci pāpakammaṃ katvā “idaṃ nāma tayā kata”nti vutte “na mayā kata”nti musāvādeneva pariharissati.
atk-s0504a:397_0: Gāthāyaṃ musāvādissāti musā abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ paresaṃ viññāpanavasena vadanasīlassa.
atk-s0504a:397_1: Yassa dasasu vacanesu ekampi saccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0504a:397_6: Īdiso hi manussasampatti devalokasampatti avasāne nibbānasampattīti imā tissopi sampattiyo na passati.
atk-s0504a:397_7: Natthi pāpanti tassa tādisassa idaṃ nāma pāpaṃ na kattabbanti natthīti.
atk-s0504a:400_1: Chaṭṭhe evañceti ettha evanti upamākāre nipāto,
atk-s0504a:400_5: Dānasaṃvibhāgassāti yāya hi cetanāya annādideyyadhammaṃ saṃharitvā anukampāpūjāsu aññataravasena paresaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0504a:400_7: Yāya pana attanā paribhuñjitabbabhāvena gahitavatthussa ekadeso saṃvibhajitvā dīyati,
atk-s0504a:400_12: tiracchānagatassapi dānaṃ datvā attabhāvasate pavattasukhavipaccanavasena sataguṇā dakkhiṇā hotīti evamādinā,
atk-s0504a:400_14: yena pakārena ahaṃ dānassa saṃvibhāgassa ca vipākaṃ kammavipākaṃ ñāṇabalena paccakkhato jānāmi,
atk-s0504a:400_16: Na adatvā bhuñjeyyunti yaṃ bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ attano atthi,
atk-s0504a:400_17: tato paresaṃ na adatvā macchariyacittena ca taṇhālobhavasena ca bhuñjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:400_19: Na ca nesaṃ maccheramalaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyāti attano sampattīnaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:400_20: cittassa pabhassarabhāvadūsakānaṃ upakkilesabhūtānaṃ kaṇhadhammānaṃ aññataraṃ maccheramalaṃ.
atk-s0504a:400_21: Atha vā yathāvuttamaccherañceva aññampi dānantarāyakaraṃ issālobhadosādimalañca nesaṃ sattānaṃ cittaṃ yathā dānacetanā na pavattati,
atk-s0504a:400_23: evaṃ pariyādāya parito gahetvā abhibhavitvā na tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0504a:400_24: Ko hi sammadeva dānaphalaṃ jānanto attano citte maccheramalassa okāsaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0504a:401_0: Yopi nesaṃ assa carimo ālopoti nesaṃ sattānaṃ yo sabbapacchimako ālopo siyā.
atk-s0504a:401_3: ime sattā pakatiyā yattakehi ālopehi sayaṃ yāpeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:401_4: tesu ekameva ālopaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapetvā tadaññe sabbe ālope āgatāgatānaṃ atthikānaṃ datvā yo ṭhapito ālopo assa,
atk-s0504a:401_7: sace nesaṃ paṭiggāhakā assūti nesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭiggāhakā yadi siyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:401_8: tatopi yathāvuttacarimālopatopi saṃvibhajitvāva ekadesaṃ datvāva bhuñjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:401_11: Yasmā ca khotiādinā kammaphalassa appaccakkhabhāvato evamete sattā dānasaṃvibhāgesu na pavattantīti yathādhippetamatthaṃ kāraṇena sampaṭipādeti.
atk-s0504a:401_12: Eteneva tesaṃ tadaññapuññesu ca appaṭipattiyā apuññesu ca paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:402_0: Gāthāsu yathāvuttaṃ mahesināti mahesinā bhagavatā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā’ tiādinā,
atk-s0504a:402_1: idheva vā “evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyu”ntiādinā yathāvuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:402_2: ñāṇacārena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ cittaṃ ñātanti attho.
atk-s0504a:402_5: Yathā hoti mahapphalanti yathā so vipāko mahantaṃ phalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:402_6: evaṃ ime sattā yadi jāneyyunti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:402_7: Vineyya maccheramalanti macchariyamalaṃ apanetvā kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ca visesato pasannena
atk-s0504a:402_8: cittena yesu kilesehi ārakattā ariyesu sīlādiguṇasampannesu dinnaṃ appakampi dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:403_3: Dakkhiṇaṃ paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathā taṃ dānaṃ hoti mahādānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:403_6: kathaṃ pana annaṃ dātabbanti āha “dakkhiṇeyyesu dakkhiṇa”nti.
atk-s0504a:403_7: Ito manussattā manussattabhāvato cutā paṭisandhivasena saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā.
atk-s0504a:403_8: Kāmakāminoti kāmetabbānaṃ uḷārānaṃ devabhogānaṃ paṭiladdharūpavibhavena kammunā upagamane sādhukāritāya kāmakāmino sabbakāmasamaṅgino.
atk-s0504a:406_0: 27. Sattame yāni kānicīti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūnīti
atk-s0504a:407_5: Puññakiriyavatthūnīti puññakiriyā ca tā tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni.
atk-s0504a:407_14: Tañhi nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammato cittassa suṭṭhu vimuttibhāvena cetovimuttīti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:407_15: Kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasinti mettābrahmavihārassa soḷasabhāgaṃ opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni na agghanti.
atk-s0504a:407_18: taṃ soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tato ekaṃ puna soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tattha yo ekakoṭṭhāso,
atk-s0504a:407_19: na taṃ aññāni opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni agghantīti.
atk-s0504a:407_22: Tapateti tato eva anavasese paṭipakkhadhamme santapati.
atk-s0504a:407_24: Mettā hi cetovimutti candālokasaṅkhātā vigatūpakkilesā juṇhā viya dippati,
atk-s0504a:407_25: ātapo viya andhakāraṃ paccanīkadhamme vidhamantī tapati,
atk-s0504a:408_17: osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyikattā osadhīti laddhanāmā tārakā.
atk-s0504a:409_1: kasmā pana bhagavatā samānepi opadhikabhāve mettā itarehi opadhikapuññehi visesetvā vuttāti? Vuccate –
atk-s0504a:409_6: evaṃ etehi samannāgatā yogino brahmasamāva hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0504a:409_8: Iti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca sattesu suppaṭipattibhāvato mettāva itarehi opadhikapuññehi visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0504a:410_0: Evampi kasmā mettāva evaṃ visesetvā vuttā?
atk-s0504a:410_1: Itaresaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dānādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ paripūrikattā ca.
atk-s0504a:410_6: atha sukheneva karuṇādibhāvanā sampajjantīti mettā itaresaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:410_7: Tathā hi sattesu hitajjhāsayatāya sati nesaṃ dukkhāsahanatā,
atk-s0504a:410_9: pakkhapātābhāvena sabbattha samappavattacittatā ca sukheneva ijjhanti.
atk-s0504a:410_11: imassa na dātabba”nti uttamavicayavasena vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasattānaṃ niravasesasukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0504a:410_16: uttamavīriyavasena vīrabhāvaṃ pattāpi sattānaṃ nānappakāraṃ hitajjhāsayeneva aparādhaṃ khamanti,
atk-s0504a:410_20: Tesu acalāya mettāya pubbakārino hitajjhāsayeneva nesaṃ vippakāre udāsīnā honti,
atk-s0504a:410_22: Evaṃ te pāramiyo pūretvā yāva dasabalacatu-
atk-s0504a:410_26: Evaṃ dānādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ pāripūrikā mettāti ca imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ sā itarehi visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0504a:411_0: Apica mettāya itarehi opadhikapuññehi mahānubhāvatā velāmasuttena dīpetabbā.
atk-s0504a:411_1: Tattha hi yathā nāma mahatā velāmassa dānato ekassa sotāpannassa dānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:411_8: tatopi gaddūhanamattaṃ kālaṃ mettābhāvanā mahapphalatarā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:412_0: “Yaṃ gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:412_5: Yo ca antamaso gaddūhanamattampi mettacittaṃ bhāveyya,
atk-s0504a:413_0: Mahaggatapuññabhāvena panassā parittapuññato sātisayatāya vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0504a:413_5: mahaggatakammaṃ pana pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odhisakānodhisakapharaṇavasena vaḍḍhitvā katattā appamāṇakataṃ nāma.
atk-s0504a:413_6: Kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa mahaggatakammassa antarā laggituṃ vā taṃ kammaṃ abhibhavitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0504a:413_7: atha kho mahaggatakammameva taṃ parittakammaṃ mahogho viya parittaṃ udakaṃ abhibhavitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0504a:413_8: tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ upanetīti ayañhi tassa atthoti.
atk-s0504a:414_0: Gāthāsu yoti yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā.
atk-s0504a:414_3: Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhisopharaṇavasena
atk-s0504a:414_5: Tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge adhigacchantassa sukheneva paṭighasaṃyojanādayo pahīyamānā tanū honti.
atk-s0504a:414_9: Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettājhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya anukkamena upadhikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0504a:414_10: patvā taṃ passato pageva dasapi saṃyojanā tanū honti,
atk-s0504a:414_12: Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti paṭigho ceva paṭighasampayuttasaṃyojanā ca tanukā honti.
atk-s0504a:414_13: Passato upadhikkhayanti tesaṃyeva kilesūpadhīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ mettaṃ adhigamavasena passanta ssāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:415_0: Evaṃ kilesappahānaṃ nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññe ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “ekampi ce”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:415_1: Tattha aduṭṭhacittoti mettābalena suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto.
atk-s0504a:415_10: sabbe pana pāṇe attano piyaputtaṃ viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahūtaṃ bahuṃ anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ
atk-s0504a:415_11: catusaṭṭhimahākappepi attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ uḷārapuññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto
atk-s0504a:417_10: Daliddamanussānaṃ potthake lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
atk-s0504a:417_11: Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti,
atk-s0504a:417_13: “Tāta mātulā”tiādinā pana saṇhavācāya saṅgahaṇaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0504a:417_15: Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ.
atk-s0504a:417_16: Manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharā viharanti.
atk-s0504a:418_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattentā
atk-s0504a:418_1: uddhammūlaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:421_1: Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ pacchimadivase eva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhīsanassa
atk-s0504a:421_2: ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:421_4: Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃbhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:421_6: Yugacchiggaḷe pavesanadaṇḍakasaṅkhātaṃ sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi
atk-s0504a:421_7: sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ
atk-s0504a:421_9: Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beḷuvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:421_11: Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0504a:422_1: Tāragaṇāva sabbeti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti,
atk-s0504a:422_2: evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettacittassa vuttalakkhaṇena subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti,
atk-s0504a:423_0: Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “yo na hantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:423_2: Na hantīti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati,
atk-s0504a:423_4: Na ghātetīti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte hanāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca.
atk-s0504a:423_5: Na jinātīti sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato,
atk-s0504a:423_6: jānikaraṇavasena vā aḍḍakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti.
atk-s0504a:423_7: Na jāpayeti parepi payojetvā paresaṃ dhanajāniṃ na kārāpeyya.
atk-s0504a:423_9: mettāya vā aṃso avijahanaṭṭhena avayavabhūtoti mettaṃso.
atk-s0504a:423_11: Tato eva veraṃ tassa na kenacīti akusalaveraṃ tassa kenacipi kāraṇena natthi,
atk-s0504a:423_12: puggalaverasaṅkhāto virodho kenaci purisena saddhiṃ tassa mettāvihārissa natthīti.
atk-s0504a:424_0: Evametasmiṃ ekakanipāte paṭipāṭiyā terasasu suttesu sikkhāsuttadvaye cāti pannarasasu suttesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:424_1: nīvaraṇasuttaṃ saṃyojanasuttaṃ appamādasuttaṃ aṭṭhisañcayasuttanti etesu catūsu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:432_6: Dukkhaṃ viharatīti catūsupi iriyāpathesu kilesadukkhena ceva kāyikacetasikadukkhena ca dukkhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0504a:432_7: Savighātanti cittūpaghātena ceva kāyūpaghātena ca savighātaṃ.
atk-s0504a:432_8: Saupāyāsanti kilesūpāyāsena ceva sarīrakhedena ca balavaāyāsavasena saupāyāsaṃ.
atk-s0504a:432_9: Sapariḷāhanti kilesapariḷāhena ceva kāyapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:432_14: Duggati pāṭikaṅkhāti duggatisaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ aññatarā gati icchitabbā,
atk-s0504a:433_3: Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena bhojane mattaṃ na jānātīti bhojane amattaññū.
atk-s0504a:434_2: Kiñcāpi hi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
atk-s0504a:434_3: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:434_4: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0504a:434_5: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyāmanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0504a:434_9: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0504a:434_12: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi,
atk-s0504a:434_13: javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:434_15: Evaṃ hontopi so “cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro”ti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a:434_16: Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0504a:434_18: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā tathāpi antonagare
atk-s0504a:434_22: Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare satidvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:434_24: Tasmiṃ pana asati javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0504a:434_26: Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārādayo asaṃvutā,
atk-s0504a:434_27: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
