atk-s0504a:862_5: Palibodhattho vāpi hi pariyuṭṭhānasaddo “corā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsū”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0504a:862_7: Te hi dibbanti uḷāratamehi kāmaguṇehi jhānādīhi ca kīḷanti,
atk-s0504a:862_8: iddhānubhāvena vā yathicchitamatthaṃ gacchanti adhigacchantīti ca devāti vuccanti.
atk-s0504a:862_11: Olīyanti eketi “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti bhavesu olīyanābhinivesabhūtena sassatabhāvena ekacce devā
atk-s0504a:862_12: manussā ca avalīyanti allīyanti saṅkocaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0504a:862_14: Atidhāvantīti paramatthato bhinnasabhāvānampi sabhāvadhammānaṃ yvāyaṃ hetuphalabhāvena sambandho,
atk-s0504a:862_15: taṃ aggahetvā nānattanayassapi gahaṇena tattha tattheva dhāvanti,
atk-s0504a:862_17: na hoti paraṃ maraṇā”ti ucchede vā bhavanirodhapaṭipattiyā paṭikkhepadhammataṃ atidhāvanti atikkamanti.
atk-s0504a:862_19: Pubbayogasampattiyā ñāṇaparipākena paññācakkhumanto pana devamanussā teneva paññācakkhunā sassataṃ ucchedañca
atk-s0504a:863_16: Na pakkhandatīti sassatābhiniviṭṭhattā saṃkhittadhammattā na pavisati na ogāhati.
atk-s0504a:863_17: Na pasīdatīti pasādaṃ nāpajjati na taṃ saddahati.
atk-s0504a:863_18: Na santiṭṭhatīti tassaṃ desanāyaṃ na tiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
atk-s0504a:864_0: Aṭṭīyamānāti bhave jarārogamaraṇādīni vadhabandhanacchedanādīni ca disvā saṃvijjanena tehi samaṅgibhāvena bhavena pīḷiyamānā dukkhāpiyamānā.
atk-s0504a:864_7: Ayaṃ attāti kārakādibhāvena attanā parikappitaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0504a:864_11: Na hoti paraṃ maraṇāti maraṇena uddhaṃ na bhavati.
atk-s0504a:864_16: Tattha “santaṃ paṇīta”nti idaṃ dvayaṃ taṇhābhinandanāya vadanti,
atk-s0504a:865_1: Tañhi paccayasambhūtattā paramatthato vijjamānattā ca bhūtanti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:865_5: Bhūtato aviparītasabhāvato salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca passati.
atk-s0504a:865_10: ime nesaṃ avijjādayo paccayā”ti evaṃ sapaccayanāmarūpadassanavasena ceva,
atk-s0504a:865_15: dukkhattā anattā”ti evaṃ aniccānupassanādivasena ca passatīti attho.
atk-s0504a:865_23: Nirodhāyāti vā paṭippassaddhinirodhena saddhiṃ anupādisesanibbānaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0504a:865_25: cakkhumanto passantīti evaṃ paññācakkhumanto sapubbabhāgena maggapaññācakkhunā catusaccadhammaṃ passanti.
atk-s0504a:866_0: Gāthāsu ye bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvāti ye ariyasāvakā bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ bhūtato aviparītasabhāvato vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya disvā.
atk-s0504a:866_3: Ariyamaggo hi bhūtaṃ atikkamati etenāti “bhūtassa atikkamo”ti vutto.
atk-s0504a:867_0: Save bhūtapariñño soti ettha pana saveti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:867_1: So bhūtapariñño bhūtassa atikkamanūpāyena maggena bhavataṇhāparikkhayā pariññātakkhandho tato eva yathābhūte nibbāne adhimutto.
atk-s0504a:867_6: apaññattikabhāvameva gacchatīti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0504a:868_0: Iti imasmiṃ vagge ekādasame vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:875_4: Tattha akusalāni ca tāni mūlāni cāti akusalamūlāni.
atk-s0504a:875_5: Atha vā akusalānaṃ hetupaccayapabhavajanakasamuṭṭhāpakanibbattakaṭṭhena mūlāni cāti akusalamūlāni,
atk-s0504a:875_7: Kāraṇañhi yathā hinoti etasmā phalaṃ pavattatīti hetu,
atk-s0504a:876_0: Keci pana “sāliādīnaṃ sālibījādīni viya maṇippabhādīnaṃ maṇivaṇṇādayo viya ca akusalānaṃ akusalabhāvasādhako lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭho”ti vadanti.
atk-s0504a:876_1: Evaṃ sante akusalacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu tesaṃ hetupaccayabhāvo na siyā.
atk-s0504a:876_2: Na hi tāni tesaṃ akusalabhāvaṃ sādhenti,
atk-s0504a:877_0: “Hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-s0504a:878_0: Ahetukassa ca mohassa akusalabhāvo na siyā akusalabhāvasādhakassa mūlantarassa abhāvato.
atk-s0504a:878_4: evaṃ alobhādīnampi sabhāvasiddho kusalādibhāvoti alobhādayo kusalā eva siyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:878_11: Evaṃ akusalabhāvasādhanavasena lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhaṃ aggahetvā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanavasena gayhamāne na koci doso.
atk-s0504a:878_12: Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā virūḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0504a:878_13: heturahitā pana tilabījakādisevālā viya na suppatiṭṭhitāti hetuādiatthena akusalānaṃ upakārakattā mūlānīti akusalamūlāni.
atk-s0504a:878_14: Yasmā pana mūlena mutto akusalacittuppādo natthi,
atk-s0504a:878_15: tasmā tīhi mūlehi sabbo akusalarāsi pariyādiyitvā dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:879_0: Tāni akusalamūlāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “lobho akusalamūla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:880_1: Hiṃsantīti attano pavattikkhaṇe āyatiṃ vipākakkhaṇe ca vibādhenti.
atk-s0504a:880_7: khadirasīsapādayo viya antosāro ahutvā bahisāratāya tacasāranti laddhanāmaṃ veḷuādiṃ yathā attasambhūtameva phalaṃ hiṃsati vināseti,
atk-s0504a:880_8: evameva anto sīlādisārarahitaṃ lāmakacittaṃ puggalaṃ attasambhūtāyeva lobhādayo vināsentīti.
atk-s0504a:883_1: Dutiye dhātuyoti attano phalassa sabhāvassa ca dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātuyo.
atk-s0504a:883_7: bhavassa āgataṭṭhāne dhātuyā paricchinditabbanti idha bhavena paricchedo kathito. Tasmā –
atk-s0504a:884_1: Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve anto karitvā etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā,
atk-s0504a:887_0: Evaṃ vuttā arūpāvacaradhammā arūpadhātu. Nirodhadhātūti nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:888_6: tena sakalo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo ca saṅgahito.
atk-s0504a:888_10: Iti dvīhi padehi tayo bhavā sabbā saṃsārappavatti dassitā.
atk-s0504a:888_11: Tatiyapadena pana asaṅkhatadhātuyeva saṅgahitāti maggaphalāni idha tikavinimuttadhammā nāma jātā.
atk-s0504a:888_13: arūpadhātūti arūpasabhāvā dhammāti padadvayena anavasesato pañcakkhandhā gahitā”ti.
atk-s0504a:889_0: Gāthāsu rūpadhātuṃ pariññāyāti rūpapaṭibaddhadhammapavattiṃ ñātapariññādīhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0504a:889_1: Āruppesu asaṇṭhitāti arūpāvacaradhammesu bhavarāgavasena bhavadiṭṭhivasena ca na patiṭṭhitā anallīnā.
atk-s0504a:889_5: Nirodhe ye vimuccantīti ye nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte aggamaggaphalavasena samucchedapaṭippassaddhīhi anavasesakilesato vimuccanti.
atk-s0504a:889_6: Te janā maccuhāyinoti te khīṇāsavajanā maraṇaṃ samatītā.
atk-s0504a:890_0: Evaṃ dhātuttayasamatikkamena amatādhigamaṃ dassetvā “ayañca paṭipadā mayā gatamaggo ca tumhākaṃ dassito”ti
atk-s0504a:890_1: tattha nesaṃ ussāhaṃ janento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0504a:890_6: Nibbānassa hi maggañāṇena sacchikiriyāya sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā hontīti taṃ tesaṃ paṭinissajjanakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:890_7: Sacchikatvāti kālena kālaṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena attapaccakkhaṃ katvā anāsavo sammāsambuddho tameva asokaṃ virajaṃ nibbānapadaṃ deseti.
atk-s0504a:893_1: Tatiye vedanāti ārammaṇarasaṃ vediyanti anubhavantīti vedanā.
atk-s0504a:893_13: “Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā”tiādīsu dukkhavedanāyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:894_10: sakalasarīraṃ bhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ satadhotasappiṃ khādāpentaṃ viya,
atk-s0504a:894_12: ghaṭasahassena pariḷāhaṃ nibbāpayamānaṃ viya ca “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:894_15: sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ tattaphālaṃ pavesentaṃ viya vilīnatambalohaṃ āsiñcantaṃ viya ca “aho dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:895_0: Adukkhamasukhā pana dubbijānā duddīpanā andhakārā avibhūtā.
atk-s0504a:895_1: Sā sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame sātāsātapaṭipakkhavasena majjhattākārabhūtā nayato gaṇhantasseva pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0504a:895_3: Yathā pubbāparaṃ sapaṃsuke padese upacaritamaggavasena piṭṭhipāsāṇe migena gatamaggo,
atk-s0504a:896_0: Evamettha sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhabhāvena tidhā vuttāpi katthaci sukhadukkhabhāvena dvidhā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:896_5: Katthaci tissopi visuṃ visuṃ sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhabhāvena “sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā,
atk-s0504a:897_1: yadi tisso vedanā yathā idha vuttā,
atk-s0504a:897_2: aññesu ca edisesu suttesu abhidhamme ca evaṃ avatvā kasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:899_0: “Dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā pariyāyenā”ti ca.
atk-s0504a:900_0: Ettha hi sukhā adukkhamasukhāti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ nippariyāyena dukkhabhāvo natthi,
atk-s0504a:900_1: veneyyajjhāsayena pana tattha nicchandadassanatthaṃ pariyāyena dukkhabhāvo vuttoti sā tādisī pariyāyadesanā.
atk-s0504a:900_2: Ayaṃ pana vedanattayadesanā sabhāvakathāti katvā nippariyāyadesanāti ayamettha ācariyānaṃ samānakathā.
atk-s0504a:901_2: yasmā bhagavatā sabbāsaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvo adhippāyavasena vutto “saṅkhārāniccataṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0504a:901_3: mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmataṃ ‘yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:901_6: “idaṃ mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ tisso vedanā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0504a:902_9: Yadi yāya uppannāya sattā viyogameva icchanti,
atk-s0504a:902_11: Yāya ca pana uppannāya sattā aviyogameva icchanti,
atk-s0504a:902_21: sā ca abhiṇhasabhāvāti kathaṃ tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ mudumajjhimādhimattadukkhabhāvo siyā?
atk-s0504a:902_22: Yadi ca saṅkhāradukkhatāya eva vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvo siyā,
atk-s0504a:902_27: saṅkhāradukkhatā”ti ayaṃ dukkhatānaṃ vibhāgadesanā nippayojanā siyā.
atk-s0504a:902_28: Tathā ca sati suttameva paṭibāhitaṃ siyā,
atk-s0504a:902_29: purimesu ca tīsu rūpāvacarajjhānesu mudukā dukkhā vedanāti āpajjati sukhavedanāvacanato.
atk-s0504a:902_32: Evaṃ sante purimā tisso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā arūpasamāpattīhi ca santatarāti āpajjati.
atk-s0504a:902_33: Kathaṃ vā santatarappaṇītatarāsu samāpattīsu dukkhavedanāya adhikabhāvo yujjati?
atk-s0504a:903_2: Vipariṇāmadukkhatāya saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca yathābhūtānavabodhena yā ekantato sukhasaññā,
atk-s0504a:903_7: vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā”ti idaṃ pana kathanti?
atk-s0504a:903_8: Idaṃ pana vipariṇāmadassane sanniyojanatthaṃ vuttaṃ tassa tattha virāguppattiyā upāyabhāvato sukhavedanāya bahudukkhānugatabhāvato ca.
atk-s0504a:903_9: Tathā hi dukkhassa hetubhāvato anekehi dukkhadhammehi anubaddhattā ca paṇḍitā sukhampi dukkhamicceva paṭipannā.
atk-s0504a:904_3: te eva adhimattaṃ akāle ca paṭiseviyamānā dukkhavedanāya hetubhāvamāpajjanti.
atk-s0504a:904_7: dukkhantarāpagame pana aviññūnaṃ sukhasaññā yathā cirataraṃ ṭhānādiiriyāpathasamaṅgī hutvā tadaññairiyāpathasamāyoge
atk-s0504a:904_8: mahantañca bhāraṃ vahato bhāranikkhepe ceva vūpasame ca,
atk-s0504a:904_10: Tayidaṃ sammadeva sukhahetuṃ apariññāya tassa niyamābhāvaparikappanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:904_11: Ārammaṇamattameva hi kevalaṃ sukhahetuṃ manasikatvā evaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:904_12: ajjhattikasarīrassa avatthāvisesaṃ samuditaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ tadubhayaṃ sukhādihetūti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:904_14: tādisaṃ na kadācipi dukkhavedanāya hetu hotīti vavatthitā eva sukhādihetu.
atk-s0504a:904_15: Yathā nāma tejodhātu sāliyavaḍākasassādīnaṃ yādisamavatthantaraṃ patvā sātamadhurabhāvahetu hoti,
atk-s0504a:904_16: na tādisameva patvā kadācipi asātaamadhurabhāvahetu hoti,
atk-s0504a:905_2: na dukkhāpagamamatte yathā addhānagamanaparissamakilantassa sambāhane iriyāpathaparivattane ca,
atk-s0504a:905_3: aññathā kālantarepi parissamāpagame tādisī sukhasaññā siyā.
atk-s0504a:905_4: Dukkhāpagamamatte pana sukhanti parikappanā vedanāvisesassa anupalabbhamānattā.
atk-s0504a:905_6: yato paṇītappaṇītāniyeva ārammaṇāni mahatā āyāsena sattā abhipatthayanti,
atk-s0504a:905_7: na ca nesaṃ yena kenaci yathāladdhamattena paccayena patikāraṃ kātuṃ sakkā taṇhuppādenāti.
atk-s0504a:905_9: tathābhāve ca sugandhamadhurasukhasamphassādivatthūnaṃ itarītarabhāvena sukhavisesasaññā jāyamānā katamassa
atk-s0504a:905_13: nāpi kevale dukkhāpagamamatteti āgamato yuttitopi vavatthitā tisso vedanāti bhagavato vedanattayadesanā nītatthāyeva,
atk-s0504a:906_0: Evametā aññamaññapaṭipakkhasabhāvavavatthitalakkhaṇā eva tisso vedanā bhagavatā desitā.
atk-s0504a:906_1: Tañca kho vipassanākammikānaṃ yogāvacarānaṃ vedanāmukhena arūpakammaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0504a:906_4: Tattha bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā catudhātuvavatthānādivasena vā katheti.
atk-s0504a:906_5: Arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathento phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā cittavasena vā katheti.
atk-s0504a:906_6: Ekaccassa hi āpāthagate ārammaṇe āvajjato tattha cittacetasikānaṃ paṭhamābhinipāto phasso taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0504a:906_7: ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī uppajjamānā vedanā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0504a:906_8: ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vijānantaṃ uppajjamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:906_9: Iti tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena yathāpākaṭaṃ phassādimukhena tidhā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ katheti.
atk-s0504a:907_2: tena saddhiṃ tadeva ārammaṇaṃ anubhavamānā vedanāpi uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:907_14: tena saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno phassopi uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:908_0: So “ime phassapañcamakā dhammā kiṃnissitā”ti upadhārento “vatthunissitā”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0504a:908_2: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idañca pana me viññāṇaṃ etthasitaṃ etthapaṭibaddha”nti.
atk-s0504a:908_3: So atthato bhūtā ceva upādārūpāni ca,
atk-s0504a:908_7: nāmaṃ cattāro arūpino khandhāti pañcakkhandhamattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:908_12: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthi,
atk-s0504a:908_13: suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattamevā”ti sappaccayanāmarūpavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti sammasanto vicarati.
atk-s0504a:908_14: So “ajja ajjā”ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhamāno tathārūpe samaye utusappāyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:908_17: dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekapallaṅkena nisinnova vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0504a:908_18: Evaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:908_19: Idha pana bhagavā vedanāvasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi. Tattha –
atk-s0504a:911_3: “Phassapaccayā vedanā”ti hi vacanato phasso vedanāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:911_4: Tathā hi so vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato niccammagāvīupamāya upamito.
atk-s0504a:911_5: Tattha sukhavedanīyo phasso sukhāya vedanāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:911_11: Sukhā vedanā tāva taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ hotu,
atk-s0504a:911_13: Vuccate sukhasamaṅgīpi tāva taṃsadisaṃ tato vā uttaritaraṃ sukhaṃ abhipattheti,
atk-s0504a:911_15: Adukkhamasukhā ca santabhāvena sukhamicceva vuccatīti tissopi vedanā taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:913_0: Anusayoti imāsu tīsu vedanāsu sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti,
atk-s0504a:914_0: “Sukhāya kho, āvuso visākha, vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:915_5: Anusayānañca tattha tattha santāne appahīnabhāvena thāmagamanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:915_6: Tasmā “sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī”ti maggena appahīnattā anurūpakāraṇalābhe uppajjanāraho rāgo,
atk-s0504a:916_2: “yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:916_3: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayita”nti ca.
atk-s0504a:917_2: Pavattikkhaṇena hi sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ sukhadukkhabhāvo vavatthito. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:919_4: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya pavattanākalanaṃ pavattiyā ākalanaṃ anākalanañca jānanaṃ ajānanañca sukhadukkhabhāvavavatthānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:920_0: “Adukkhamasukhā kho, āvuso visākha, vedanā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā”ti.
atk-s0504a:921_0: Indriyanti etā hi sukhādayo tisso vedanā sukhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:921_15: Yatheva hi anuggahasabhāvā bādhakasabhāvā ca sukhadukkhavedanā aññathā kāyassa anuggahaṃ bādhakañca karonti,
atk-s0504a:922_0: Dvidhāditāti sabbāpi hi vedanā vedayitaṭṭhena ekavidhāpi nissayabhedena duvidhā –
atk-s0504a:922_11: tathā rūpādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu ekekasmiṃ sukhādivasena tisso tisso katvā.
atk-s0504a:923_4: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ dhammaṃ upavicarati,
atk-s0504a:926_8: ettakā vedanā”ti sabhāvato vibhāgato “aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti aniccādilakkhaṇato ca pubbabhāge
atk-s0504a:926_9: tīhi pariññāhi parijānanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena pariññāpaṭivedhena pajānāti.
atk-s0504a:926_11: Yattha cetā nirujjhantīti ettāvatā vedanā yattha nirujjhanti,
atk-s0504a:926_13: Khayagāminanti vedanānaṃ khayagāminaṃ ariyamaggañca pajānātīti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:926_14: Vedanānaṃ khayāti evaṃ cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhantena ariyamaggena vedanānaṃ anuppādanirodhā.
atk-s0504a:929_1: Catutthe dukkhato daṭṭhabbāti sukhavedanā vipariṇāmadukkhavasena dukkhāti ñāṇacakkhunā passitabbā.
atk-s0504a:929_2: Sallato daṭṭhabbāti dunnīharaṇaṭṭhena antotudanaṭṭhena pīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhadukkhabhāvena dukkhavedanā sallanti passitabbā.
atk-s0504a:929_3: Aniccatoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭipakkhato ca adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccāti passitabbā.
atk-s0504a:929_5: aniccadassanato pana sātisayaṃ virāganimittaṃ dukkhadassananti imamatthaṃ dassento satthā “sukhā,
atk-s0504a:929_15: vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā”ti vatvā “sukhāpi tāva edisī,
atk-s0504a:929_16: dukkhā nu kho kīdisī”ti cintentānaṃ dukkhadukkhatāya “dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā”ti āha,
atk-s0504a:929_17: itarā pana saṅkhāradukkhatāya eva dukkhāti dassento “adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā”ti avoca.
atk-s0504a:930_0: Ettha ca “sukhā vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā”ti etena rāgassa samugghātanūpāyo dassito.
atk-s0504a:930_2: “Dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā”ti etena dosassa samugghātanūpāyo dassito.
atk-s0504a:930_4: “Adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā”ti etena mohassa samugghātanūpāyo dassito.
atk-s0504a:931_0: Tathā paṭhamena taṇhāsaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ dassitaṃ tassa sukhassādahetukattā,
atk-s0504a:931_2: Yathābhūtañhi dukkhaṃ aparijānantā tassa pariharaṇatthaṃ duccaritaṃ caranti.
atk-s0504a:931_3: Tatiyena diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ aniccato passantassa diṭṭhisaṃkilesābhāvato avijjānimittattā diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa,
atk-s0504a:931_11: Virattesu hi tadārammaṇadhammesu ārammaṇānipi virattāneva hontīti.
atk-s0504a:931_12: Paṭhamena vā rāgappahānaparikittanena dukkhānupassanāya appaṇihitavimokkho dīpito hoti,
atk-s0504a:931_14: tatiyena mohappahānaparikittanena anattānupassanāya suññatavimokkho dīpito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:932_2: Sammaddasoti sabbāsaṃ vedanānaṃ catunnampi vā saccānaṃ aviparītadassāvī.
atk-s0504a:932_3: Acchecchi taṇhanti vedanāmūlakaṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggena chindi,
atk-s0504a:932_12: Tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ viya,
atk-s0504a:932_14: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti evaṃ arahattamaggena mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0504a:933_3: Sukhavedanā hi visamissaṃ viya bhojanaṃ paribhogakāle assādaṃ dadamānā vipariṇāmakāle dukkhāyevāti.
atk-s0504a:933_4: Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti yathā sallaṃ sarīraṃ anupavisantampi paviṭṭhampi uddhariyamānampi pīḷameva janeti,
atk-s0504a:933_5: evaṃ dukkhavedanā uppajjamānāpi ṭhitippattāpi bhijjamānāpi vibādhatiyevāti taṃ sallato vipassīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:933_6: Addakkhi naṃ aniccatoti sukhadukkhato santasabhāvatāya santatarajātikampi naṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ aniccantikatāya aniccato passi.
atk-s0504a:934_0: Sa ve sammaddasoti so evaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ sammadeva dukkhādito dassāvī.
atk-s0504a:934_6: tasmā tattha vedanāya tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena samucchedavasena vimuccati.
atk-s0504a:934_7: Yaṃsadde hi vutte taṃsaddo āharitvā vattabbo.
atk-s0504a:934_8: Atha vā yatoti kāyavācācittehi saṃyato yatatto,
atk-s0504a:934_11: Abhiññāvositoti vedanāmukhena catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā chaṭṭhābhiññāya pariyosito katakicco.
atk-s0504a:939_0: Tasmā kāmarāgo kāmesanāti veditabbo. Bhavesanāyapi eseva nayo. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:940_0: “Tattha katamā bhavesanā? Yo bhavesu bhavacchando…pe… bhavajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā”ti.
atk-s0504a:942_8: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā,
atk-s0504a:942_9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā,
atk-s0504a:942_10: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā,
atk-s0504a:942_11: yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ
atk-s0504a:942_12: gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho,
atk-s0504a:943_0: Tasmā diṭṭhigatasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanā diṭṭhibrahmacariyesanāti veditabbāti.
atk-s0504a:944_1: Kāmarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
atk-s0504a:944_4: Bhavarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ,
atk-s0504a:946_0: Gāthāsu sambhavanti ettha esanānaṃ uppattihetubhūtā avijjādayo taṇhā cāti sambhavo,
atk-s0504a:946_2: Yattha cetā nirujjhantīti brahmacariyesanā paṭhamamaggena nirujjhati,
atk-s0504a:949_17: Tā eva ca uparūpari vaḍḍhamānā lobhādikilesasamussayena ca samussayā,
atk-s0504a:949_19: moghamañña”nti micchābhinivisamānā sabbānatthahetubhūtā kilesadukkhūpacayahetubhūtā ca diṭṭhiyo brahmacariyesanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:949_20: Etena pavattiākārato nibbattito ca brahmacariyesanā dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:950_1: Tato eva taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuttattā taṇhakkhayavimuttino arahato.
atk-s0504a:950_4: Diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti brahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca paṭhamamaggeneva samugghātitā.
atk-s0504a:950_5: Esanānaṃ khayāti evametāsaṃ tissannaṃ esanānaṃ khayā anuppādanirodhā bhinnakilesattā.
atk-s0504a:950_7: Nirāsoti ca diṭṭhekaṭṭhassa vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallassa pahīnattā akathaṃkathīti ca vuccatīti.
atk-s0504a:953_3: atthato pana kāmarāgo rūpādiabhirati ca kāmāsavo.
atk-s0504a:953_4: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhavapatthanā ca bhavāsavo.
atk-s0504a:954_0: Āsavānañca sambhavanti ettha ayonisomanasikāro avijjādayo ca kilesā āsavānaṃ sambhavo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:955_0: “Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjanti, uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhantī”ti.
atk-s0504a:956_0: “Avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirikaṃ anottappa”nti ca.
atk-s0504a:957_3: Kāmupādānaṃ viya kāmāsavopi aggamaggavajjhoti ca vadanti.
atk-s0504a:960_5: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhavavasena patthanā ca bhavataṇhā.
atk-s0504a:960_7: Apica pacchimataṇhādvayaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā sabbāpi taṇhā kāmataṇhā eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:962_1: dhammataṇhāti visayabhedato paccekaṃ chabbidhāti katvā aṭṭhārasa honti.
atk-s0504a:962_7: Puna saṅgahe kariyamāne kālabhedaṃ anāmasitvā gayhamānā chattiṃseva honti,
atk-s0504a:963_6: Khuddake ceva mahante ca bhave laggacittāti attho.
atk-s0504a:963_12: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “taṇhāyogenā”ti iminā kāmataṇhāva dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:963_13: Te yogayuttā mārassāti te evaṃbhūtā puggalā mārassa pāsasaṅkhātena yogena yuttā baddhā.
atk-s0504a:963_14: Rāgo hi mārayogo mārapāsoti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:965_0: Tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:969_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ khandhādīnaṃ aparāparuppattisaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0504a:969_4: Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ “ye ca taṇhaṃ pahantvānā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0504a:972_2: Ekadivasaṃ kira satthā sekkhabahulāya parisāya parivuto nisinno tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā upari visesādhigamāya
atk-s0504a:972_3: ussāhaṃ janetuṃ asekkhabhūmiṃ thomento idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0504a:972_7: Ādiccova yathā ādicco abbhādiupakkilesavimutto attano iddhiyā ānubhāvena tejasāti tīhi guṇehi samannāgato
atk-s0504a:972_8: nabhaṃ abbhussakkamāno sabbaṃ ākāsagataṃ tamaṃ atikkamma atikkamitvā abhibhavitvā vidhamitvā virocati,  obhāsati, tapati;
atk-s0504a:972_9: evameva khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tīhi dhammehi samannāgato sabbupakkilesavimutto māradheyyasaṅkhātaṃ tebhūmakadhammappavattaṃ abhibhavitvā virocatīti.
atk-s0504a:973_2: apariyositasikkhattā sayameva sikkhantīti vā sekkhā maggadhammā heṭṭhimaphalattayadhammā ca.
atk-s0504a:973_3: Aggaphaladhammā pana upari sikkhitabbābhāvena na sekkhāti asekkhā.
atk-s0504a:973_5: tatthāyaṃ paṭisedhoti lokiyadhammesu nibbāne ca asekkhabhāvānāpatti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0504a:973_6: Sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātā hi sikkhā attano paṭipakkhakilesehi vippayuttā parisuddhā upakkilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvampi
atk-s0504a:973_9: tasmā catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayadhammā viya arahattaphaladhammāpi “tāsu sikkhāsu jātā”ti ca,
atk-s0504a:973_10: taṃsikkhāsamaṅgino arahato itaresaṃ viya sekkhatte sati “sekkhassa ete”ti ca “sikkhā sīlaṃ etesa”nti
atk-s0504a:973_11: ca sekkhāti āsaṅkā siyunti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ asekkhāti yathāvuttasekkhabhāvappaṭisedhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:973_12: Arahattaphale pavattamānā hi sikkhā pariniṭṭhitakiccattā na sikkhākiccaṃ karonti,
atk-s0504a:973_17: “Sikkhāsu jātā”ti evamādiatthehi aggaphaladhammā sekkhā na honti.
atk-s0504a:973_18: Heṭṭhimaphalesu pana sikkhā sakadāgāmimaggavipassanādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvato sikkhākiccaṃ karontīti sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti,
atk-s0504a:974_1: asekkhāti padaṃ pariyositasikkhānaṃ dassananti na lokiyadhammanibbānānaṃ asekkhabhāvāpatti.
atk-s0504a:974_2: Vuḍḍhippattā sekkhā asekkhā ca sekkhadhammesu eva kesañci vuḍḍhippattānaṃ asekkhatā āpajjatīti arahattamaggadhammā vuḍḍhippattā.
atk-s0504a:974_3: Yathāvuttehi ca atthehi sekkhāti katvā asekkhā āpannāti ce? Taṃ na,
atk-s0504a:974_5: Arahattamaggato hi ninnānākaraṇaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ṭhapetvā pariññādikiccakaraṇaṃ vipākabhāvañca,
atk-s0504a:974_6: tasmā te eva sekkhā dhammā arahattaphalabhāvaṃ āpannāti sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0504a:974_7: Kusalasukhato ca vipākasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataranti vuḍḍhippattāva te dhammā hontīti “asekkhā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0504a:975_0: Te pana asekkhadhamme khandhavasena idha tidhā vibhajitvā tehi samannāgamena khīṇāsavassa ānubhāvaṃ vibhāvento
atk-s0504a:975_3: Khandhasaddo pana rāsimhi paññattiyaṃ ruḷhiyaṃ guṇeti bahūsu atthesu diṭṭhappayogo.
atk-s0504a:975_4: Tathā hi “asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu rāsimhi āgato.
atk-s0504a:975_5: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu paññattiyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:975_6: “Cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho”tiādīsu ruḷhiyaṃ. “Na kho,
atk-s0504a:975_8: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā,
atk-s0504a:975_11: khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito”tiādīsu guṇe.
atk-s0504a:976_2: sammāājīvo ca sabhāveneva asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma,
atk-s0504a:976_4: Tadupakārakato pana sammāvāyāmasammāsatiyo samādhikkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0504a:976_6: Tadupakārakato sammāsaṅkappo paññākkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti evamettha aṭṭhapi arahattaphaladhammā tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassitāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:977_0: Yassa ete subhāvitāti yena arahatā ete sīlādayo asekkhadhammakkhandhā subhāvitā suṭṭhu vaḍḍhitā,
atk-s0504a:982_3: puññāni ca tāni hetupaccayehi kattabbato kiriyā cāti puññakiriyā.
atk-s0504a:982_4: Tā eva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthubhāvato puññakiriyavatthūni.
atk-s0504a:982_5: Dānamayanti anupacchinnabhavamūlassa anuggahavasena pūjāvasena vā attano deyyadhammassa paresaṃ pariccāgacetanā dīyati etāyāti dānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:982_7: Cīvarādīsu hi catūsu paccayesu annādīsu vā dasasu dānavatthūsu rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu taṃ taṃ dentassa
atk-s0504a:982_8: tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu
atk-s0504a:983_1: dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa sīlapūraṇatthaṃ pabbajissāmīti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa manorathaṃ
atk-s0504a:983_2: matthakaṃ pāpetvā “pabbajito vatamhi sādhu suṭṭhū”ti āvajjentassa saddhāya pātimokkhaṃ paripūrentassa
atk-s0504a:983_3: paññāya cīvarādike paccavekkhantassa satiyā āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa vīriyena
atk-s0504a:983_4: ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā sīlatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma.
atk-s0504a:984_0: Tathā paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jivhaṃ, kāyaṃ, manaṃ. Rūpe…pe… dhamme,
atk-s0504a:984_9: Jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa yā cetanā,
atk-s0504a:984_10: yā ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pavattā jhānacetanā,
atk-s0504a:984_11: yā ca anavajjesu kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānesu paricayamanasikārādivasena pavattā cetanā,
atk-s0504a:984_12: sabbā bhāveti etāyāti bhāvanāmayaṃ vuttanayena puññakiriyavatthu cāti.
atk-s0504a:985_0: Ekamekañcettha yathārahaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya kāyena karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:985_2: kāyaṅgaṃ vācaṅgañca acopetvā manasā cintentassa manokammaṃ.
atk-s0504a:985_3: Annādīni dentassa cāpi “annadānādīni demī”ti vā dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.
atk-s0504a:985_5: khayato vayato kammato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.

atk-s0504a:990_1: Yathā hi paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ parivattentassa ekacce anusandhiṃ asallakkhentasseva gacchanti,

atk-s0504a:990_3: Sabbaṃ taṃ pana mahaggatakusalacetanānaṃ vasena bhāvanāmayameva puññakiriyavatthu hoti,
atk-s0504a:993_6: tathā hi vadanti “madhuṃ cakkhati byañjanaṃ cakkhatī”ti imāni ca ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavantāni assādentāni viya hontīti cakkhanaṭṭhena cakkhūni.
atk-s0504a:994_1: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti.
atk-s0504a:994_2: Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:994_3: dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attano ca dibbavihārasannissitattā ālokapariggahena mahājutikattā.
atk-s0504a:995_0: Pajānātīti paññā. Kiṃ pajānāti? Cattāri ariyasaccāni “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:996_0: “Pajānātīti kho, āvuso, tasmā paññāti vuccati. Kiñca pajānāti? Idaṃ dukkha”ntiādi.
atk-s0504a:997_9: Visesato panettha āsavakkhayañāṇasaṅkhātā paññā catusaccadassanaṭṭhena paññācakkhūti adhippetā.
atk-s0504a:998_5: Maṃsacakkhu dibbacakkhu ca lokiyāni sāsavāni rūpavisayāni,
atk-s0504a:999_2: Akkhāsi purisuttamoti purisānaṃ uttamo aggo sammāsambuddho desesi.
atk-s0504a:999_8: so ca kasiṇamaṇḍale uggahanimittena vinā natthīti.
atk-s0504a:999_12: Yassa cakkhussa paṭilābhāti yassa ariyassa paññācakkhussa uppattiyā bhāvanāya sabbasmā vaṭṭadukkhato pamuccati parimuccatīti.
atk-s0504a:1002_2: Yāni hi sahajātadhammesu issarā viya hutvā tehi anuvattitabbāni,
atk-s0504a:1002_4: Apica indo bhagavā dhammissaro paramena cittissariyena samannāgato.
atk-s0504a:1002_5: Tena indena sabbapaṭhamaṃ diṭṭhattā adhigatattā paresañca diṭṭhattā desitattā vihitattā gocarabhāvanāsevanāhi diṭṭhattā ca indriyāni.
atk-s0504a:1002_8: Anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti “anamatagge saṃsāre anaññātaṃ anadhigataṃ amatapadaṃ catusaccadhammameva
atk-s0504a:1002_9: vā jānissāmī”ti paṭipannassa iminā pubbabhāgena uppannaṃ indriyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1002_13: ājānāti paṭhamamaggañāṇena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvāva jānātīti aññā.
atk-s0504a:1002_14: Yatheva hi paṭhamamaggapaññā dukkhādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena pavattati,
atk-s0504a:1002_15: tatheva ayampi pavattatīti aññā ca sā yathāvuttenaṭṭhena indriyaṃ cāti aññindriyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1002_16: Ājānanaṭṭheneva aññassa vā ariyapuggalassa indriyanti aññindriyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1002_17: sotāpattiphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1002_18: Aññātāvindriyanti aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1003_4: Khayasminti anavasesakilesānaṃ khepanato khayasaṅkhāte aggamagge ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pureyeva uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1003_5: Tato aññā anantarāti tato maggañāṇato anantarā arahattaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1003_6: Atha vā ujumaggānusārinoti līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanādike vajjetvā samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā
atk-s0504a:1003_7: bhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ pubbabhāgamaggaṃ anussarantassa anugacchantassa paṭipajjantassa gotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ
atk-s0504a:1003_8: diṭṭhekaṭṭhānaṃ kilesānaṃ khepanato khayasmiṃ sotāpattimagge paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1003_10: Tato aññā anantarāti tato paṭhamañāṇato anantarā anantarato paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggā aññā aññindriyaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1004_0: Tato aññā vimuttassāti tato aññā aññindriyato pacchā arahattamaggañāṇānantarā arahattaphalena paññāvimuttiyā aññātāvindriyena vimuttassa.
atk-s0504a:1004_1: Ñāṇaṃ ve hoti tādinoti arahattaphaluppattito uttarakāle iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattassa khīṇāsavassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1005_0: Idāni tādisaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ thomento “sa ve indriyasampanno”ti tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0504a:1005_1: Tattha indriyasampannoti yathāvuttehi tīhi lokuttarindriyehi samannāgato,
atk-s0504a:1005_2: suddhehipi vā paṭippassaddhiladdhehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgato paripuṇṇo,
atk-s0504a:1005_3: tato eva cakkhādīhi suṭṭhu vūpasantehi nibbisevanehi indriyehi samannāgato.
atk-s0504a:1008_5: Tattha suttantapariyāyena paṭisandhito pubbe atīto addhā nāma,
atk-s0504a:1008_7: saha cutipaṭisandhīhi tadanantaraṃ paccuppanno addhā nāma.
atk-s0504a:1008_9: bhaṅgoti ime tayo khaṇe patvā niruddhadhammā atīto addhā nāma,
atk-s0504a:1008_10: tayopi khaṇe asampattā anāgato addhā nāma,
atk-s0504a:1009_5: Tato pubbe visabhāgautuāhārasamuṭṭhānā atītā pacchā anāgatā.
atk-s0504a:1009_10: tesaṃyeva pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1009_11: Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattidivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānā taṃtaṃsamaye paccuppannā nāma,
atk-s0504a:1009_28: Atītādibhede pana dhamme upādāya paramatthato avijjamānopi kālo idha teneva vohārena atītotiādinā vuttoti veditabbo.

atk-s0504a:1014_2: ca purisoti ca ādinā pavattasaññāvasena akkheyyasaññino,
atk-s0504a:1015_0: Akkheyyaṃ apariññāyāti taṃ akkheyyaṃ tebhūmakadhamme tīhi pariññāhi aparijānitvā tassa aparijānanahetu.
atk-s0504a:1015_1: Yogamāyanti maccunoti maraṇassa yogaṃ tena saṃyogaṃ upagacchanti,
atk-s0504a:1016_1: tena yojitaṃ pasāritaṃ mārasenaṭṭhāniyaṃ anatthajālaṃ kilesajālañca upagacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:1017_0: “Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:1018_0: Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ “akkheyyañca pariññāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1018_3: tena akkheyyaparijānanena laddhabbaṃ vakkhamānameva visesaṃ joteti.
atk-s0504a:1018_4: Pariññāyāti vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya dukkhanti paricchijja jānitvā,
atk-s0504a:1018_5: tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānena vā taṃ samatikkamitvā tissannampi pariññānaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā.
atk-s0504a:1018_6: Akkhātāraṃ na maññatīti sabbaso maññanānaṃ pahīnattā khīṇāsavo akkhātāraṃ na maññati,
atk-s0504a:1018_7: kārakādisabhāvaṃ kiñci attānaṃ na paccetīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1018_12: Atha vā “pariññāyā”ti padena dukkhasaccassa pariññābhisamayaṃ samudayasaccassa pahānābhisamayañca vatvā idāni “phuṭṭho vimokkho manasā,
atk-s0504a:1018_17: So panassa maggacittena phuṭṭho phusito bhāvito,
atk-s0504a:1018_18: teneva anuttaraṃ santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ phuṭṭhaṃ phusitaṃ sacchikatanti.
atk-s0504a:1019_0: Akkheyyasampannoti akkheyyanimittaṃ vividhāhi vipattīhi upaddute loke pahīnavipallāsatāya tato suparimutto
atk-s0504a:1019_2: Saṅkhāya sevīti paññāvepullappattiyā cīvarādipaccaye saṅkhāya parituletvāva sevanasīlo,
atk-s0504a:1019_3: saṅkhātadhammattā ca āpāthagataṃ sabbampi visayaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena saṅkhāya sevanasīlo.
atk-s0504a:1019_4: Dhammaṭṭhoti asekkhadhammesu nibbānadhamme eva vā ṭhito.
atk-s0504a:1019_6: Evaṃguṇo arahā bhavādīsu katthaci āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato manussadevāti saṅkhyaṃ na upeti,
atk-s0504a:1022_6: Imāni ca duccaritāni paññattiyā vā kathetabbāni kammapathehi vā.
atk-s0504a:1022_7: Tattha paññattiyā tāva kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa vītikkamo kāyaduccaritaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1022_9: ubhayattha paññattassa vītikkamo manoduccaritanti ayaṃ paññattikathā.
atk-s0504a:1022_13: tathā catasso musāvādādicetanā vacīduccaritaṃ, abhijjhā, byāpādo,
atk-s0504a:1022_14: micchādiṭṭhīti tayo cetanāsampayuttadhammā manoduccaritanti ayaṃ kammapathakathā.
atk-s0504a:1023_0: Gāthāyaṃ kammapathappattoyeva pāpadhammo kāyaduccaritādibhāvena vuttoti tadaññaṃ pāpadhammaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ “yañcaññaṃ dosasañhita”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1026_10: ubhayattha paññattassa avītikkamo manosucaritanti ayaṃ paññattikathā.
atk-s0504a:1026_11: Pāṇātipātādīhi pana viramantassa uppannā tisso cetanāpi viratiyopi kāyasucaritaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1026_12: musāvādādīhi viramantassa catasso cetanāpi viratiyopi vacīsucaritaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1026_14: sammādiṭṭhīti tayo cetanāsampayuttadhammā manosucaritanti ayaṃ kammapathakathā.
atk-s0504a:1030_0: Gāthāyaṃ samucchedavasena pahīnasabbakāyaduccaritattā kāyena sucīti kāyasuci.
atk-s0504a:1033_1: Aṭṭhame moneyyānīti ettha idhalokaparalokaṃ attahitaparahitañca munātīti muni,
atk-s0504a:1033_2: kalyāṇaputhujjanena saddhiṃ satta sekkhā arahā ca.
atk-s0504a:1034_0: Atha vā munibhāvakarā moneyyapaṭipadādhammā moneyyāni. Tesamayaṃ vitthāro –
atk-s0504a:1041_2: tasmā yassa kassaci puggalassa gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā.
atk-s0504a:1041_3: Rāgo appahīnoti rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo samucchedavasena na pahīno,
atk-s0504a:1041_10: Evametesu pahīyantesu tadekaṭṭhato sabbepi kilesā pahīyanteva.
atk-s0504a:1041_11: Evamete rāgādayo yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā maggena appahīnā.
atk-s0504a:1041_15: Paṭimukkassa mārapāsoti paṭimukko assa anena appahīnakilesena puggalena tāyeva appahīnakilesatāya mārapāsasaṅkhāto
atk-s0504a:1041_18: Atha vā paṭimukko assa bhaveyya mārapāso.
atk-s0504a:1041_19: Sukkapakkhe omukkassāti avamukko mocito apanīto assa.
atk-s0504a:1042_2: yassa ariyapuggalassa rāgadosāvijjā virājitā aggamaggena nirodhitā,
atk-s0504a:1042_3: taṃ bhāvitakāyasīlacittapaññatāya bhāvitattesu arahantesu aññataraṃ abbhantaraṃ ekaṃ brahmabhūtaṃ brahmaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ arahattaphalaṃ pattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1042_4: Yathā aññe khīṇāsavā pubbūpanissayasampattisamannāgatā hutvā āgatā,
atk-s0504a:1042_5: yathā ca te antadvayarahitāya sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhasahagatāya majjhimāya paṭipadāya nibbānaṃ gatā adhigatā.
atk-s0504a:1042_6: Yathā vā te khandhādīnaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:1042_7: yathā ca te tathadhamme dukkhādayo aviparītato abbhaññiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:1042_8: rūpādike ca visaye yathā te diṭṭhamattādivaseneva passiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:1042_9: yathā vā pana te aṭṭha anariyavohāre vajjetvā ariyavohāravaseneva pavattavācā,
atk-s0504a:1042_15: Sabbesaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ pahīnattā sabbappahāyinaṃ buddhādayo ariyā āhu kathenti kittentīti.
atk-s0504a:1045_14: Sagahaṃ sarakkhasanti attano gocaragatānaṃ anatthajananato caṇḍamakaramacchakacchaparakkhasasadisehi visabhāgapuggalehi sahitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1045_19: Pāraṅgatoti tassa samuddassa pāraṃ paratīraṃ nirodhaṃ upagato.
atk-s0504a:1045_20: Thale tiṭṭhatīti tato eva saṃsāramahoghaṃ kāmādimahoghañca atikkamitvā thale paratīre nibbāne bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇo tiṭṭhatīti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1047_0: Saṅgātigoti rāgādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ saṅgānaṃ atikkantattā pahīnattā saṅgātigo.
atk-s0504a:1047_1: Atthaṅgato so na pamāṇametīti so evaṃbhūto arahā rāgādīnaṃ pamāṇakaradhammānaṃ accantameva atthaṃ gatattā atthaṅgato,
atk-s0504a:1047_2: tato eva sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā ca “ediso sīlena samādhinā paññāyā”ti kenaci pamiṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyo pamāṇaṃ na eti,
atk-s0504a:1047_3: atha vā anupādisesanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gato so arahā “imāya nāma gatiyā ṭhito,
atk-s0504a:1047_4: ediso ca nāmagottenā”ti pamiṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pamāṇaṃ na eti na upagacchati.
atk-s0504a:1047_6: tena anubandhituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti vadāmīti anupādisesanibbānadhātuyāva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0504a:1047_7: Iti imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamapañcamachaṭṭhesu vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1052_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame diṭṭhā mayāti mayā diṭṭhā,

atk-s0504a:1052_6: Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi guṇaparidhaṃsanena abhūtabbhakkhānena upavādakā akkosakā garahakā.
atk-s0504a:1052_10: Ettha ca vacīmanoduccaritaggahaṇeneva ariyūpavādamicchādiṭṭhīsu gahitāsu punavacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ nesaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1053_10: taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
atk-s0504a:1054_0: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1056_0: Taṃ kho panātiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa attapaccakkhabhāvaṃ daḷhataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1057_0: Gāthāsu micchā manaṃ paṇidhāyāti abhijjhādīnaṃ vasena cittaṃ ayoniso ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0504a:1057_1: Micchā vācañca bhāsiyāti micchā musāvādādivasena vācaṃ bhāsitvā.

atk-s0504a:1100_5: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi,

atk-s0504a:1105_11: So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.

atk-s0504a:1123_10: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabbo.

atk-s0504a:1125_0: Pāṇātipātāti ettha pāṇassa saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atipātanaṃ atipāto,
atk-s0504a:1125_1: saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho.
atk-s0504a:1125_2: Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto,
atk-s0504a:1125_7: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassatīti.
atk-s0504a:1125_8: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0504a:1125_9: Yāya hi cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetukamahābhūtapaccayā uppajjanakamahābhūtā purimasadisā na uppajjanti,
atk-s0504a:1125_12: Laddhūpakkamāni hi bhūtāni purimabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātiyānaṃ kāraṇāni na hontīti.
atk-s0504a:1125_13: “Kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā”ti idaṃ manodvāre pavattāya vadhakacetanāya pāṇātipātatāsambhavadassanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1125_14: Kulumbasuttepi hi “idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā ceto vasippatto aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1125_15: pāpakena manasā anupekkhitā hotī”ti vijjāmayiddhi adhippetā.

atk-s0504a:1127_0: Ettha ca payogavatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato veditabbā.

atk-s0504a:1127_3: Satipi kadāci khuddake ceva mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa cetanā tibbatarā
atk-s0504a:1127_5: Iti ubhayampetaṃ cetanābalavabhāveneva mahāsāvajjatāya hetu hoti.

atk-s0504a:1127_8: Tasmā payogavatthuādipaccayānaṃ amahattepi guṇamahantatādipaccayehi cetanāya balavabhāvavaseneva mahāsāvajjatā veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1129_1: khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu, ko hantā,

atk-s0504a:1129_10: Tattha na tāva atītesu anāgatesu ca sambhavati tesaṃ avijjamānasabhāvattā,
atk-s0504a:1129_11: paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā,

atk-s0504a:1130_2: Tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittaṃ apagatusmāviññāṇajīvitindriyo matoti vohārassa vatthubhūto yathāvuttavadhappayogākaraṇe

atk-s0504a:1136_5: Visaṃvādanādhippāyena hi payoge katepi parena tasmiṃ atthe aviññāte visaṃvādanassa asijjhanato parassa tadatthavijānanampi eko sambhāro veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1136_9: Sace pana paro dandhatāya vicāretvā tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0504a:1137_11: Lakkhaṇato pana yathāvuttassa surāmerayasaṅkhātassa majjassa bījato paṭṭhāya madavasena kāyadvārappavattā pamādacetanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1137_17: Ariyasāvakānaṃ pana vatthuṃ ajānantānampi mukhaṃ na pavisati,
atk-s0504a:1137_21: kāyasañcālanasamatthaṃ bahuṃ pivitvā gāmaghātakādikammaṃ karontassa mahāsāvajjameva.
atk-s0504a:1137_26: surāpānaṃ patvā kāyasañcālanasamatthaṃ bahuṃ pivitvā gāmaghātakādikammaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1138_14: Sanniṭṭhāpakacittena pana ubhayampi majjhattavedanaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0504a:1138_17: adinnādānaṃ musāvādo ca dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena vā,
atk-s0504a:1138_21: Phalato sabbepi apāyūpapattiphalā ceva sugatiyampi appāyukatādinānāvidhaaniṭṭhaphalā cāti evamettha sabhāvādito vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1139_0: Appaṭiviratāti samādānaviratiyā sampattaviratiyā ca abhāvena na paṭiviratā.
atk-s0504a:1139_1: Dussīlāti tato eva pañcasīlamattassāpi abhāvena nissīlā.
atk-s0504a:1140_0: Idhāpi pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīnaṃ sabhāvato ārammaṇato, vedanato, mūlato, kammato,
atk-s0504a:1140_3: Tattha sabhāvato pañcapi cetanāyopi honti viratiyopi,
atk-s0504a:1140_5: Yā pāṇātipātā viramantassa “yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati viratī”ti evaṃ vuttā kusalacittasampayuttā virati.
atk-s0504a:1140_10: Tattha asamādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ attano jātivayabāhusaccādīni paccavekkhitvā “ayuttametaṃ amhākaṃ kātu”nti
atk-s0504a:1140_11: sampattavatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati sampattavirati nāma.
atk-s0504a:1140_12: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ sikkhāpadasamādāne taduttari ca attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati samādānavirati nāma.
atk-s0504a:1140_14: yassā uppattito paṭṭhāya ariyapuggalānaṃ “pāṇaṃ ghātessāmā”ti cittampi na uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1141_2: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-s0504a:1141_3: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāyeva ete kusaladhammā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahanti.
atk-s0504a:1142_0: Mūlato ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlā honti,
atk-s0504a:1142_4: Samādānato aññassa garuṭṭhāniyassa santike taṃ alabhantena sayameva vā pañca sīlāni ekajjhaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vā samādiyantena samādinnāni honti.
atk-s0504a:1142_11: Pabbajitānaṃ pana ekasmiṃ vītikkante sabbāni bhijjantīti.
atk-s0504a:1145_17: Yasmā pana micchācārāveramaṇiyā phalānipi ettheva antogadhāni,
atk-s0504a:1148_3: Yo pana putto mātāpitūsu assaddhesu dussīlesu ca sayampi tādiso,
atk-s0504a:1148_5: Assaddhiyādayo hi idha avajātabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ vuttā,
atk-s0504a:1148_7: Mātāpitaro pana upādāya puttassa atijātādibhāvo vuccatīti.
atk-s0504a:1150_0: Ete kho puttā lokasminti ete atijātādayo tayo puttā eva imasmiṃ sattaloke puttā nāma,
atk-s0504a:1150_2: Imesu pana ye bhavanti upāsakā ye saraṇagamanasampattiyā upāsakā bhavanti kammassakatāñāṇena kammassa kovidā,
atk-s0504a:1150_7: tesaṃ vā “dehī”ti vacanaṃ sutvā “ime pubbe dānaṃ adatvā evaṃbhūtā,
atk-s0504a:1150_8: mayā pana evaṃ na bhavitabba”nti tesaṃ pariccāgena tadatthaṃ jānantīti vadaññū,
atk-s0504a:1150_9: paṇḍitānaṃ vā kammassakatādidīpakaṃ vacanaṃ jānantīti vadaññū.
atk-s0504a:1153_2: Ekacco hi megho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo hutvā uṭṭhahitvā thananto gajjanto vijjotanto ekaṃ udakabindumpi apātetvā vigacchati,
atk-s0504a:1153_6: Ekacco ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitesu manussesu yathā ekacce tementi,
atk-s0504a:1153_11: Ekacco hi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pattharitvā sabbatthakameva abhivassati,
atk-s0504a:1153_12: taṃ cātuddīpikamahāmeghaṃ ekaccassa puggalassa upamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “sabbatthābhivassī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1154_3: thaddhamaccharitāya na kassaci kiñci detīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1154_4: Idāni dānassa khettaṃ deyyadhammañca vibhāgena dassetuṃ “samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:1154_5: Tattha samitapāpasamaṇā ceva pabbajjamattasamaṇā ca bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇā ceva jātimattabrāhmaṇā ca idha “samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti adhippetā.
atk-s0504a:1154_8: Vanibbakā nāma ye “iṭṭhaṃ detha kantaṃ manāpaṃ kālena anavajjaṃ udaggacittā pasannacittā,
atk-s0504a:1154_10: gacchatha brahmaloka”ntiādinā nayena dāne niyojentā dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomentā vicaranti.
atk-s0504a:1154_19: Yānanti rathavayhādi antamaso upāhanaṃ upādāya gamanasādhanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1154_21: Gandhanti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ pisitaṃ apisitaṃ gandhūpakaraṇañca.
atk-s0504a:1154_23: Seyyāti mañcapīṭhādi ceva pāvārakojavādi ca sayitabbavatthu.
atk-s0504a:1155_1: bhikkhaveti vijjamānepi deyyadhamme paṭiggāhakānaṃ evaṃ dātabbavatthuṃ sabbena sabbaṃ adento puggalo avassikameghasadiso hoti.
atk-s0504a:1155_4: yathā so megho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo hutvā uṭṭhahitvā na kiñci vassi vigacchati,
atk-s0504a:1155_5: evameva yo uḷāraṃ vipulañca bhogaṃ saṃharitvā gehaṃ āvasanto kassaci kaṭacchumattaṃ bhikkhaṃ vā uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāguṃ vā adatvā vigacchati,
atk-s0504a:1155_9: Imesu ca tīsu puggalesu paṭhamo ekaṃseneva garahitabbo,
atk-s0504a:1156_0: Gāthāsu samaṇeti upayogavasena bahuvacanaṃ tathā sesesupi.
atk-s0504a:1156_2: samaṇe dakkhiṇeyye pavāretvā puṭṭho na saṃvibhajati.
atk-s0504a:1156_3: Annaṃ pānañca bhojananti annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ bhojanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1156_6: yo atthikabhāvena upagate sampaṭiggāhake labhitvā annādinā saṃvibhāgamattampi na karoti,
atk-s0504a:1156_8: taṃ evarūpaṃ thaddhamacchariyaṃ purisādhamaṃ nihīnapuggalaṃ paṇḍitā avuṭṭhikasamoti āhu kathayantīti.
atk-s0504a:1157_0: Ekaccānaṃ na dadātīti vijjamānepi mahati dātabbadhamme ekesaṃ sattānaṃ tesu kodhavasena vā,
atk-s0504a:1158_2: so sulabhabhikkhatāya subhikkhā vācā etassāti subhikkhavāco.
atk-s0504a:1158_7: Āmodamāno pakiretīti tuṭṭhahaṭṭhamānaso sahatthena dānaṃ dento paṭiggāhakakhette deyyadhammaṃ pakirento viya hoti,
atk-s0504a:1159_0: Idāni naṃ subhikkhavassitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yathāpi megho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1159_2: yathā mahāmegho paṭhamaṃ mandanigghosena thanayitvā puna sakalanadīkandarāni ekaninnādaṃ karonto gajjayitvā pavassati,
atk-s0504a:1159_3: sabbatthakameva vārinā udakena thalaṃ ninnañca abhisandanto pūreti ekoghaṃ karoti,
atk-s0504a:1159_4: evameva idha imasmiṃ sattaloke ekacco uḷārapuggalo sabbasamatāya so mahāmegho viya vassitabbattā tādiso
atk-s0504a:1159_5: yathā dhanaṃ uṭṭhānādhigataṃ attano uṭṭhānavīriyābhinibbattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:1159_6: evaṃ analaso hutvā tañca dhammena ñāyena saṃharitvā tannibbattena annena pānena aññena ca deyyadhammena
atk-s0504a:1159_7: patte sampatte vanibbake sammā sammadeva desakālānurūpañceva icchānurūpañca tappeti sampavāretīti.
atk-s0504a:1162_7: Pasaṃsā me āgacchatūti “mama kalyāṇo kittisaddo āgacchatū”ti icchanto paṇḍito sappañño sīlaṃ rakkheyya.
atk-s0504a:1162_8: Sīlavato hi gahaṭṭhassa tāva “asuko asukakulassa putto sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo saddho pasanno dāyako kārako”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:1162_10: pabbajitassa “asuko nāma bhikkhu sīlavā vattasampanno sorato sukhasaṃvāso sagāravo sappatisso”tiādinā…pe…
atk-s0504a:1163_0: “Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1166_0: Bhogā me uppajjantūti ettha gahaṭṭhassa tāva sīlavato kalyāṇadhammassa yena yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti –
atk-s0504a:1166_4: taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhiñca ativiya appamattabhāvato athassa anuppannā ceva bhogā uppajjanti,
atk-s0504a:1166_6: Pabbajitassa pana sīlācārasampannassa appamādavihārissa sato sīlasampannassa sīlasampadāya appicchatādiguṇesu
atk-s0504a:1166_7: ca pasannā manussā uḷāruḷāre paccaye abhiharanti,
atk-s0504a:1167_2: sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1172_0: Idāni pasaṃsādikāraṇassa sīlassa viya pasaṃsādīnampi visesakāraṇaṃ pāpamittaparivajjanaṃ kalyāṇamittasevanañca
atk-s0504a:1172_2: Tattha saṅkiyoti pāpasmiṃ parisaṅkitabbo “addhā iminā pāpaṃ kataṃ vā karissati vā,
atk-s0504a:1172_5: assa vā puggalassa avaṇṇo abhūtopi pāpajanasevitāya ruhati virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati pattharati.
atk-s0504a:1172_8: Sa ve tādisako hotīti yo yādisaṃ pāpamittaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ vā bhajati upasevati ca,
atk-s0504a:1172_9: so puggalo bhūmibhāgavasena udakaṃ viya tādisova hoti,
atk-s0504a:1172_12: yasmā sahavāso saṃsaggo uparāgo viya phalikamaṇīsu purisaupanissayabhūtaṃ puggalākāraṃ gāhāpeti,
atk-s0504a:1172_13: tasmā pāpapuggalena saha vāso na kātabboti adhippāyo.
atk-s0504a:1173_0: Sevamāno sevamānanti paraṃ pakatisuddhaṃ puggalaṃ kālena kālaṃ attānaṃ sevamānaṃ sevamāno bhajamāno pāpapuggalo,
atk-s0504a:1173_2: Samphuṭṭho samphusanti tena pakatisuddhena puggalena sahavāsena saṃsaggena samphuṭṭho pāpapuggalo sayampi,
atk-s0504a:1173_4: Saro diddho kalāpaṃ vāti yathā nāma saro visena diddho litto sarakalāpagato sarasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ sarakalāpaṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ alittampi upalimpati,
atk-s0504a:1173_5: evaṃ pāpena upalepabhayā dhīroti dhitisampannattā dhīro paṇḍitapuriso pāpasahāyo na bhaveyya.
atk-s0504a:1174_0: Pūtimacchaṃ kusaggenāti yathā kucchitabhāvena pūtibhūtaṃ macchaṃ kusatiṇaggena yo puriso upanayhati puṭabandhavasena bandhati,
atk-s0504a:1174_1: tassa te kusā apūtikāpi pūtimacchasambandhena pūti duggandhameva vāyanti.
atk-s0504a:1174_3: Evaṃ dhīrūpasevanāti yathā asurabhinopi pattā tagarasambandhena surabhiṃ vāyanti,
atk-s0504a:1174_4: evaṃ paṇḍitūpasevanā pakatiyā asīlavato sīlasamādānādivasena sīlagandhavāyanassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:1175_0: Tasmāti yasmā akalyāṇamittasevanāya kalyāṇamittasevanāya ca ayaṃ ediso ādīnavo ānisaṃso ca,
atk-s0504a:1175_1: tasmā pattapuṭasseva palāsapuṭassa viya duggandhasugandhavatthusaṃsaggena asādhusādhujanasannissayena ca.
atk-s0504a:1175_2: Ñatvā sampākamattanoti attano dukkhudrayaṃ sukhudrayañca phalanipphattiṃ ñatvā jānitvā asante pāpamitte na upaseveyya,
atk-s0504a:1175_3: sante upasante vantadose pasatthe vā paṇḍite seveyya.
atk-s0504a:1175_6: Iti bhagavā paṭhamagāthāya yathāvuttāni tīṇi sukhanimittāni dassetvā tato parāhi pañcahi gāthāhi paṭipakkhaparivajjanena
atk-s0504a:1175_7: saddhiṃ pasaṃsāsukhassa āgamanaṃ dassetvā osānagāthāya tiṇṇampi sukhānaṃ āgamanakāraṇena saddhiṃ osānasukhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1178_4: evaṃ kucchitānaṃ jegucchānaṃ āyo uppattidesotipi kāyo.
atk-s0504a:1178_10: Atthato pana catusantativasena pavattamānānaṃ bhūtupādāyadhammānaṃ puñjo.
atk-s0504a:1178_13: ayaṃ catumahābhūtamayo rūpakāyo bhiduro bhedanasīlo bhedanasabhāvo khaṇe khaṇe viddhaṃsanasabhāvoti.
atk-s0504a:1178_26: pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ete “upadhīyati ettha dukkha”nti upadhisaññitā sabbepi upādānakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārapañcakāmaguṇadhammā
atk-s0504a:1178_29: jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbasabhāvatāya pakativijahanaṭṭhena vipariṇāmadhammā.
atk-s0504a:1178_30: Evamettha aniccadassanasukhatāya rūpadhamme viññāṇañca visuṃ gahetvā puna upadhivibhāgena sabbepi tebhūmakadhamme
atk-s0504a:1178_31: ekajjhaṃ gahetvā aniccadukkhānupassanāmukhena tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena sammasanacāro.kathito.
atk-s0504a:1178_34: tadanattā”ti pana vacanato dukkhalakkhaṇeneva anattalakkhaṇampi dassitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1179_0: Gāthāyaṃ upadhīsu bhayaṃ disvāti upadhīsu bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇavasena bhayaṃ disvā,
atk-s0504a:1179_3: Bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇameva hi vibhajitvā visesavasena ādīnavānupassanā nibbidānupassanāti ca vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1179_4: Jātimaraṇamaccagāti evaṃ sammasanto vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā maggaparamparāya arahattaṃ patto jātimaraṇaṃ atīto nāma hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0504a:1179_5: Sampatvā paramaṃ santinti paramaṃ uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ santiṃ sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantvā.
atk-s0504a:1179_6: Evaṃbhūto ca kālaṃ kaṅkhati bhāvitattoti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ vasena bhāvanābhisamayanipphattiyā bhāvitakāyasīlacittapaññattā
atk-s0504a:1179_7: bhāvitatto maraṇaṃ jīvitañca anabhinandanto kevalaṃ attano khandhaparinibbānakālaṃ kaṅkhati udikkhati,
atk-s0504a:1179_8: na tassa katthaci patthanā hotīti. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:1184_4: Saṃsandantīti tāya dhātusabhāgatāya yathādhātu yathāajjhāsayaṃ allīyanti ekato honti.
atk-s0504a:1184_5: Samentīti tāya eva samānajjhāsayatāya ekacittā hutvā samāgacchanti aññamaññaṃ bhajanti upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0504a:1184_6: attano rucibhāvakhantidiṭṭhiyo vā tattha tattha same karontā pavattanti.
atk-s0504a:1184_7: Hīnādhimuttikāti hīne kāmaguṇādike adhimutti etesanti hīnādhimuttikā,
atk-s0504a:1184_9: Kalyāṇādhimuttikāti kalyāṇe nekkhammādike adhimutti etesanti kalyāṇādhimuttikā,
atk-s0504a:1184_19: Evaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ pana na kevalaṃ etarahi eva,
atk-s0504a:1185_5: Sambahulā kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāraṃ caranti.
atk-s0504a:1185_6: Te manussā bahuṃ bhattaṃ āharitvā pattāni pūretvā “yathāsabhāgaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0504a:1185_11: gijjhakūṭapabbatasmiñhi gilānaseyyāya nipanno bhagavā ārakkhatthāya parivāretvā vasantesu sāriputtamoggallānādīsu
atk-s0504a:1185_12: ekamekaṃ attano parisāya saddhiṃ caṅkamantaṃ oloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi “passatha no tumhe,
atk-s0504a:1185_14: sāriputtaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ caṅkamantanti. Evaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0504a:1186_5: kāyasaṃsaggoti evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yato kutoci saṃsaggato.
atk-s0504a:1186_6: Vanatho jātoti kileso uppanno maggena asamūhato.
atk-s0504a:1186_7: Asaṃsaggena chijjatīti saṃsaggapaṭikkhepena kāyavivekādinā pubbabhāge chijjitvā puna accantāsaṃsaggena samucchedavivekena chijjati pahīyati.
atk-s0504a:1186_8: Ettāvatā saṅkhepato hīnādhimuttiyā samudayo atthaṅgamo ca dassito hoti.
atk-s0504a:1187_0: Yasmā pana te saṃsaggā te ca kilesā kosajjavasena uppajjanti ceva vaḍḍhanti ca,
atk-s0504a:1187_2: tasmā hīnādhimuttike kusītapuggale vajjetvā kalyāṇādhimuttike āraddhavīriye sevantena asaṃsaggena saṃsaggajo
atk-s0504a:1187_3: vanatho chinditabboti yathāvuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento kusītasevanāya tāva ādīnavaṃ pakāsetuṃ “parittaṃ
atk-s0504a:1188_0: Tattha parittaṃ dārunti khuddakaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ kullaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1188_1: Yathā sīde mahaṇṇaveti yathā khuddakaṃ kullaṃ āruhitvā mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo tīraṃ appatvā samuddamajjheyeva sīdeyya,
atk-s0504a:1188_4: sādhujīvīpi sīdatīti evameva kusītaṃ vīriyārambharahitaṃ kilesavasikaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya tena katasaṃsaggo
atk-s0504a:1188_5: sādhujīvīpi parisuddhājīvo parisuddhasīlopi samāno hīnasaṃsaggato uppannehi kāmavitakkādīhi khajjamāno
atk-s0504a:1188_8: tasmā taṃ āgamma ālasiyānuyogena kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusītaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1188_9: Tato eva hīnavīriyaṃ nibbīriyaṃ akalyāṇamittaṃ parivajjeyya.

atk-s0504a:1263_6: “ito devalokato cuto manussesu uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patto kāyaduccaritādiṃ sabbaṃ duccaritaṃ pahāya kāyasucaritādiṃ
atk-s0504a:1263_7: sabbaṃ sucaritaṃ uḷāraṃ vipulaṃ upacinitvā ariyamaggena āgatasaddho bhavāhī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1263_8: Yasmā pana lokuttaresu paṭhamamaggaṃ dutiyamaggampi vā icchanti attano devalokūpapattiyā anativattanato,
atk-s0504a:1263_9: tasmā tesampi vasena “appamāṇaṃ nirūpadhi”ntipadānaṃ attho veditabbo –
atk-s0504a:1263_11: sattamabhavato vā uppajjanārahassa khandhūpadhissa taṃnibbattakaabhisaṅkhārūpadhissa taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesūpadhissa
atk-s0504a:1263_12: ca pahānena tesaṃ anibbattanato nirupadhisaṅkhātanibbānasannissitattā ca nirupadhīti.
atk-s0504a:1264_0: Evaṃ accantameva apāyadvārapidhāyakaṃ kammaṃ dassetvā idāni saggasampattinibbattakakammaṃ dassetuṃ “tato opadhika”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1264_1: Tattha opadhikanti upadhivepakkaṃ attabhāvasampattiyā ceva bhogasampattiyā ca nibbattakanti attho.
atk-s0504a:1264_3: Yathāha “santekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni upadhisampattipaṭibāhitāni na vipaccantī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1264_11: taṃ bahuṃ uḷāraṃ katvā. Kathaṃ? Dānena.
atk-s0504a:1264_15: Yasmā pana te devā asurakāyahāniṃ ekanteneva devakāyapāripūriñca icchanti,
atk-s0504a:1264_16: tasmā tassa upāyaṃ dassentā “aññepi macce saddhamme,
atk-s0504a:1264_18: Yadā vidūti yasmiṃ kāle devā devaṃ cavantaṃ vidū vijāneyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:1264_20: ime devakāye punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena ehi āgacchāhī”ti ca anumodentīti.
atk-s0504a:1267_5: Tesu indriyabaddhānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānañca santānavasena vattamānānaṃ samūho sattaloko,
atk-s0504a:1267_31: orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimadese uppajjati tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:1267_32: Na kevalañca tathāgatova paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asītimahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattirājā
atk-s0504a:1267_33: aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0504a:1267_34: Idha pana tathāgatavāreyeva sabbatthakavasena ayaṃ nayo labbhati,
atk-s0504a:1268_0: Uppajjamānā uppajjantīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva,
atk-s0504a:1268_2: na aññena kāraṇenāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1268_3: Evarūpañhettha saddalakkhaṇaṃ na sakkā aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0504a:1269_0: Apica uppajjamāno nāma uppajjati nāma uppanno nāmāti ayaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1269_13: paripakkañāṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamento paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto,
atk-s0504a:1269_15: pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anekākāraṃ sabbasaṅkhāre sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhanto
atk-s0504a:1269_16: yāva anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikarontopi uppajjamāno eva nāma,
atk-s0504a:1269_19: Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīnaṃ uppādanakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0504a:1269_20: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi buddhaguṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti.
atk-s0504a:1269_21: Tasmā te nibbattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppannā nāma honti.
atk-s0504a:1270_0: Sāvakopi khīṇāsavo sāvakabodhiyā hetubhūte puññasambhāre sambharanto pubbayogaṃ pubbacariyaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1270_1: pūrento carimabhave nibbattanto anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajjāya cetayamāno
atk-s0504a:1270_2: pabbajjaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā sīlādīni paripūrento dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno jāgariyaṃ anuyuñjanto
atk-s0504a:1270_3: ñāṇāni nibbattento vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā heṭṭhimamagge adhigacchantopi uppajjamāno eva nāma,
atk-s0504a:1270_6: Sekkho pana pubbūpanissayato paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhuñāṇā uppajjamāno nāma,
atk-s0504a:1270_11: puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjantī”ti padānaṃ attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0504a:1271_4: Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā dhammaṃ paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0504a:1271_6: Bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanasuttantadesanāya aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0504a:1271_7: Evaṃ yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā dhammaṃ paṭividdhasattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi,
atk-s0504a:1271_10: samacittadesanāyanti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayaṃ pattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0504a:1271_12: Sāvakassa pana arahato sekkhassa ca lokānukampāya uppatti dhammasenāpatiādīhi dhammabhaṇḍāgārikādīhi
atk-s0504a:1271_14: aparabhāge ca mahāmahindattherādīhi desitadesanāya paṭividdhasaccānaṃ vasena,
atk-s0504a:1271_15: yāvajjatanā ito paraṃ anāgate ca sāsanaṃ nissāya saggamokkhamaggesu patiṭṭhahantānaṃ vasenapi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
atk-s0504a:1272_5: mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa rakkhitā gopitāti.
atk-s0504a:1272_6: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti idha devamanussaggahaṇena bhabbapuggale veneyyasatte eva gahetvā
atk-s0504a:1272_7: tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya tathāgatassa uppatti dassitā paṭhamavāre,
atk-s0504a:1272_8: dutiyatatiyavāresu pana arahato sekkhassa ca vasena yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1272_12: Nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0504a:1272_15: Vuttañhetaṃ “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0504a:1273_15: Sabbassāpi neyyassa sabbappakārena sayambhuñāṇena buddhattā buddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0504a:1274_1: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññaṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0504a:1274_2: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0504a:1274_3: Ekagāthāpi hi samantabhaddakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā,
atk-s0504a:1274_12: Sakalopi vā sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0504a:1274_21: Taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0504a:1274_24: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0504a:1274_25: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi sukhameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-s0504a:1274_26: tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo.
atk-s0504a:1275_0: Yaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti,
atk-s0504a:1275_21: nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1275_22: sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesaṃ cariyabhāvato ca brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1275_25: Paṭhamoti gaṇanānupubbato sabbalokuttamabhāvato ca paṭhamo puggalo.
atk-s0504a:1276_0: Tasseva satthu sāvakoti tasseva yathāvuttaguṇassa satthu sammāsambuddhassa dhammadesanāya savanante jāto dhammasenāpatisadiso sāvako,
atk-s0504a:1276_1: na pūraṇādi viya paṭiññāmattena satthu sāvako.
atk-s0504a:1276_2: Pāṭipadoti paṭipadāsaṅkhātena ariyamaggena ariyāya jātiyā jāto bhavoti pāṭipado,
atk-s0504a:1276_4: Suttageyyādi pariyattidhammo bahuṃ suto etenāti bahussuto.
atk-s0504a:1276_5: Pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlena ceva āraññikaṅgādidhutaṅgavatehi ca upapanno sampanno samannāgatoti sīlavatūpapanno.
atk-s0504a:1276_7: sā ca imesu eva tīsu puggalesu paṭibaddhā”ti dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1277_0: Gāthāsu tassanvayoti tasseva satthu paṭipattiyā dhammadesanāya ca anugamanena tassanvayo anujāto.
atk-s0504a:1277_1: Avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā saparasantānesu dhammālokasaṅkhātāya pabhāya karaṇato pabhaṅkarā.
atk-s0504a:1277_9: Sudesitaṃ maggamanukkamantīti tena sammā desitaṃ ariyamaggaṃ tassa desanānusārena anugacchanti paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0504a:1280_1: Chaṭṭhe asubhānupassīti asubhaṃ anupassantā dvattiṃsākāravasena ceva uddhumātakādīsu gahitanimittassa
atk-s0504a:1280_2: upasaṃharaṇavasena ca kāyasmiṃ asubhaṃ asubhākāraṃ anupassakā hutvā viharatha.
atk-s0504a:1281_5: ānāpānassati ca tumhākaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hotūti.
atk-s0504a:1282_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva rāgacaritavitakkacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanāvasena samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1282_1: vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca upadisitvā idāni suddhavipassanākammaṭṭhānameva dassento “sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassino
atk-s0504a:1282_6: aniccānupassīti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Hutvā, abhāvato,
atk-s0504a:1282_14: Ettha ca ekādasavidhā asubhakathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pāpetvā,
atk-s0504a:1282_17: sā pana sabbākārato visuddhimagge kathitāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1283_4: So kesādīsu uddhumātakādīsu vā asubhānupassīnaṃ asubhanimittaṃ gahetvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0504a:1283_5: taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā adhigatena anāgāmimaggena pahīyati,
atk-s0504a:1283_8: Bāhirāti bahiddhāvatthukattā anatthāvahattā ca bāhirā bahibhūtā.
atk-s0504a:1283_10: Te hi appahīnā āsayānugatā sati paccayasamavāye uppajjanato vitakkāsayāti vuttā.
atk-s0504a:1283_11: Kāmavitakko cettha kāmarāgaggahaṇena gahito evāti tadavasesā vitakkā eva vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1283_23: kāmavitakkena saddhiṃ navavidhā mahāvitakkā ānāpānassatisamādhinā tannissitāya ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā.
atk-s0504a:1283_24: Taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatena ariyamaggena yathārahaṃ anavasesato pahīyanti.
atk-s0504a:1284_1: sā pahīyatīti yā saccasabhāvapaṭicchādinī sabbānatthakārī sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhūtā avijjā,
atk-s0504a:1284_3: Idaṃ kira bhagavatā aniccākārato vuṭṭhitassa sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1284_5: tebhūmakesu sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccādito sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassantānaṃ yadā aniccanti pavattamānā vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā maggena ghaṭīyati,
atk-s0504a:1284_7: tesaṃ aniccānupassīnaṃ viharataṃ avijjā anavasesato pahīyati,
atk-s0504a:1284_9: Aniccānupassīnaṃ viharatanti idaṃ aniccalakkhaṇassa tesaṃ pākaṭabhāvato itarassa lakkhaṇadvayassa gahaṇe upāyabhāvato vā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1285_0: Gāthāsu ānāpāne paṭissatoti ānāpānanimittasmiṃ paṭi paṭi sato,
atk-s0504a:1285_3: Ātāpī sabbadāti antarāvosānaṃ anāpajjitvā asubhānupassanādīsu satataṃ ātāpī yuttappayutto,
atk-s0504a:1285_5: niyato vā sammattaniyāmena tattha sabbasaṅkhārasamathe nibbāne arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimuccati.
atk-s0504a:1288_1: Sattame dhammānudhammapaṭipannassāti ettha dhammo nāma navavidho lokuttaradhammo,
atk-s0504a:1288_4: Ayamanudhammo hotīti ayaṃ anucchavikasabhāvo patirūpasabhāvo hoti.
atk-s0504a:1288_8: yena anudhammena taṃ dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipannoti byākaramāno sammadeva byākaronto nāma siyā,
atk-s0504a:1288_13: ayaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipannassa bhikkhuno tathārūpo ayanti kathanāyānurūpahetu anucchavikakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1288_14: Bhāsamāno dhammaṃyeva bhāseyyāti kathento ce dasakathāvatthudhammaṃyeva katheyya,
atk-s0504a:1289_0: “Yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0504a:1289_12: evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1290_0: Abhisallekhikāya kathāya lābhī eva hi taṃ bhāseyya. Etena kalyāṇamittasampadā dassitā.
atk-s0504a:1291_0: Dhammavitakkanti nekkhammavitakkādiṃ dhammato anapetaṃ vitakkayato “sīlādipaṭipadaṃ paripūressāmī”ti uparūpari ussāho abhivaḍḍhissati.
atk-s0504a:1291_1: So pana vitakko sīlādīnaṃ anupakāradhamme vajjetvā upakāradhamme anubrūhanavasena hānabhāgiyabhāvaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0504a:1291_2: ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvepi aṭṭhatvā visesabhāgiyataṃ nibbedhabhāgiyatañca pāpanavasena pavattiyā anekappabhedo
atk-s0504a:1291_4: No adhammavitakkanti kāmavitakkaṃ no vitakkeyyāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1291_5: Tadubhayaṃ vā panāti yadetaṃ paresaṃ anuggahaṇatthaṃ dhammabhāsanaṃ attano anuggahaṇatthaṃ dhammavitakkanañca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1291_6: Atha vā pana taṃ ubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā appaṭipajjitvā akatvā.
atk-s0504a:1291_7: Upekkhakoti tathāpaṭipattiyaṃ udāsīno samathavipassanābhāvanameva anubrūhanto vihareyya,
atk-s0504a:1291_8: samathapaṭipattiyaṃ upekkhako hutvā vipassanāyameva kammaṃ karonto vihareyya.
atk-s0504a:1291_9: Vipassanampi ussukkāpetvā tatthapi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇavasena upekkhako yāva vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggena ghaṭīyati,
atk-s0504a:1291_10: tāva yathā taṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
atk-s0504a:1292_0: Gāthāsu samathavipassanādhammo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti dhammārāmo.
atk-s0504a:1292_2: Tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanato dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ taṃ dhammaṃ āvajjento,
atk-s0504a:1292_5: Atha vā vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paresaṃ desanāvasena sīlādidhammo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti dhammārāmo.
atk-s0504a:1292_6: Tatheva tasmiṃ dhamme rato abhiratoti dhammarato.
atk-s0504a:1292_7: Tesaṃyeva sīlādidhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto kāmavitakkādīnaṃ okāsaṃ adatvā nekkhammasaṅkappādidhammaṃyeva anuvicintanato dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1292_8: Tadubhayaṃ vā pana oḷārikato dahanto ajjhupekkhitvā samathavipassanādhammameva uparūpari bhāvanāvasena anussaranto anubrūhanavasena pavattento.
atk-s0504a:1292_9: Saddhammāti sattatiṃsappabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā ca na parihāyati,
atk-s0504a:1293_1: Tattha caraṃ vāti bhikkhācāravasena caṅkamanavasena ca caranto vā.
atk-s0504a:1293_2: Yadi vā tiṭṭhanti tiṭṭhanto vā nisinno vā,
atk-s0504a:1293_5: Ajjhattaṃ samayaṃ cittanti yathāvutte kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocarajjhatte attano cittaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ vūpasamanavasena pajahanavasena samayaṃ samento.
atk-s0504a:1296_8: vipassanāpaññāti imā tisso paññā appavattikaraṇena nirodhentīti paññānirodhikā.
atk-s0504a:1296_9: Aniṭṭhaphaladāyakattā dukkhasaṅkhātassa vighātassa pakkhe vattantīti vighātapakkhikā.
atk-s0504a:1297_1: So hi kilesakāmasahito hutvā vatthukāmesu pavattati.
atk-s0504a:1297_4: Ime dve ca sattesupi saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti.
atk-s0504a:1297_5: Kāmavitakko hi piyamanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:1297_6: byāpādavitakko appiye amanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva nāsanā uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:1297_9: “ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu”nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1298_1: Atthato hi kāmavitakkādīnaṃ kāmasaṅkappādīnañca nānākaraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0504a:1299_12: Idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā rajjuyā vā aññataraññatarena satte viheṭheti,
atk-s0504a:1301_0: Tattha dve kathā sabbasaṅgāhikā ca asambhinnā ca.
atk-s0504a:1301_1: Tattha kāmadhātuyā gahitāya itarā dvepi gahitā nāma honti.
atk-s0504a:1301_3: ayaṃ vihiṃsādhātūti dassetīti ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā nāma.
atk-s0504a:1301_4: Kāmadhātuṃ kathento pana bhagavā byāpādadhātuṃ byāpādadhātuṭṭhāne,

atk-s0504a:1390_0: Saṅghā vā gaṇā vāti janasamūhasaṅkhātā yāvatā loke saṅghā vā gaṇā vā.
atk-s0504a:1390_1: Tathāgatasāvakasaṅghoti aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhasaṅkhāto diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho.
atk-s0504a:1390_2: Tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti attano sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādiguṇavisesena tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1390_4: Cattāri purisayugānīti yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1390_5: yāva catutthamaggaṭṭho catutthaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni.
atk-s0504a:1390_6: Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭha purisapuggalā.
atk-s0504a:1390_7: Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni,
atk-s0504a:1390_9: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni,
atk-s0504a:1391_3: Mahapphalabhāvakaraṇato taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti āhuneyyo.
atk-s0504a:1391_4: Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbaṃ sāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1391_6: Yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo nāma aggi,
atk-s0504a:1392_0: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
atk-s0504a:1394_0: Sā eva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti. ;
atk-s0504a:1395_0: Tayidaṃ nikāyantare “āhavanīyo”ti padaṃ idha “āhuneyyo”ti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1396_0: Pāhuneyyoti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ atthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1396_1: tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1396_4: “piyamanāpattakarehi dhammehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāhunamassa dātuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1396_8: tasmā saṅgho sabbapaṭhamaṃ ānetvā ettha hunitabbanti pāhavanīyo,
atk-s0504a:1397_1: taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati dakkhiṇāya vā hito mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena visodhanatoti dakkhiṇeyyo.
atk-s0504a:1397_2: Ubho hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhapetvā sabbalokena kariyamānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo.
atk-s0504a:1397_3: Anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1397_4: Yathā hi rattasālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ “rattasālikkhettaṃ yavakkhetta”nti vuccati,
atk-s0504a:1397_6: Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhanibbattakāni puññāni virūhanti,
atk-s0504a:1397_7: tasmā saṅgho anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa. Idhāpi –
atk-s0504a:1401_0: Ādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena saṅghe pasādassa phalavisesayogo,
atk-s0504a:1401_2: Tathā anuttariyapaṭilābho sattamabhavādito paṭṭhāya vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedo anuttarasukhādhigamoti evamādiuḷāraphalanipphādanavasena
atk-s0504a:1402_2: Aggaṃ dhammanti aggasabhāvaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ ratanattayassa anaññasādhāraṇaṃ uttamasabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1402_4: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato aggappasādavatthuṃ dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇato taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “agge buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1402_5: Tattha pasannānanti aveccappasādena itarappasādena ca pasannānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1402_7: sabbassa rāgassa sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavirāgahetubhūte accantaupasamahetubhūte cāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1403_0: Aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadatanti agge ratanattaye dānaṃ dentānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajantānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1403_1: Tattha dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā parinibbutañca bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0504a:1403_2: uddissa dhātucetiyādike upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā buddhe dānaṃ dadanti nāma.
atk-s0504a:1403_3: “Dhammaṃ pūjessāmā”ti dhammadhare puggale catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā dhammañca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karontā dhamme dānaṃ dadanti nāma.
atk-s0504a:1403_4: Tathā ariyasaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā taṃ uddissa itarasmimpi tathā paṭipajjantā saṅghe dānaṃ dadanti nāma.
atk-s0504a:1403_5: Aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti evaṃ ratanattaye pasannena cetasā uḷāraṃ pariccāgaṃ uḷārañca pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattentānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1403_6: divase divase aggaṃ uḷāraṃ kusalaṃ upacīyati.
atk-s0504a:1403_7: Idāni tassa puññassa aggavipākatāya aggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “aggaṃ āyū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1403_8: Tattha aggaṃ āyūti dibbaṃ vā mānusaṃ vā aggaṃ uḷāratamaṃ āyu.
atk-s0504a:1404_1: atha vā aggassa deyyadhammassa dānaṃ uḷāraṃ katvā tattha puññaṃ pavattetā.
atk-s0504a:1404_2: Aggadhammasamāhitoti aggena pasādadhammena dānādidhammena ca samāhito samannāgato acalappasādayutto,
atk-s0504a:1404_3: tassa vā vipākabhūtehi bahujanassa piyamanāpatādidhammehi yutto.
atk-s0504a:1404_4: Aggappatto pamodatīti yattha yattha sattanikāye uppanno,
atk-s0504a:1404_6: aggabhāvaṃ vā lokuttaramaggaphalaṃ adhigato pamodati abhiramati paritussatīti.
atk-s0504a:1407_2: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme viharante bhikkhū āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ senāsanāni
atk-s0504a:1407_3: paññāpentā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmentā sāmaṇerā ca lābhabhājanīyaṭṭhāne sampattasampattānaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhantā
atk-s0504a:1407_6: Te kira sabbeva navā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1407_8: bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgha”nti tesaṃ paṇāmitabhikkhūnaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ yāci.
atk-s0504a:1407_10: Atha mahābrahmā “katāvakāso khomhi bhagavatā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0504a:1407_11: Atha bhagavā “bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti ānandattherassa ākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0504a:1407_12: Atha te bhikkhū ānandattherena pakkositā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sārajjamānarūpā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0504a:1407_13: Bhagavā tesaṃ sappāyadesanaṃ vīmaṃsanto “ime āmisahetu paṇāmitā,
atk-s0504a:1408_2: eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā pubbantakappikā pubbantānudiṭṭhino”tiādīsu koṭṭhāse āgato.
atk-s0504a:1408_5: “Haritantaṃ vā pathantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā”tiādīsu mariyādāyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1408_8: “Appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni anto nimuggaposīnī”tiādīsu abbhantare.
atk-s0504a:1410_0: Eraṇḍo anto rukkhānaṃ, tayo antā samāgatā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:1411_2: Tasmā antamidaṃ bhikkhave jīvikānanti bhikkhave idaṃ jīvikānaṃ antaṃ pacchimaṃ lāmakaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1411_4: Yadidaṃ piṇḍolyanti yaṃ idaṃ piṇḍapariyesanena bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1412_1: Kupitā hi manussā attano paccatthikaṃ “pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho piṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno careyyāsī”ti akkosanti.
atk-s0504a:1412_3: yo tvaṃ evaṃ balavīriyūpapannopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kapaṇo piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī”ti evampi akkosantiyeva.
atk-s0504a:1412_4: Tañca kho etanti taṃ etaṃ abhisapampi samānaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1412_5: Kulaputtā upenti atthavasikāti mama sāsane jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca atthavasikā kāraṇavasikā hutvā kāraṇavasaṃ paṭicca upenti upagacchanti.
atk-s0504a:1413_0: Rājābhinītātiādīsu ye rañño santakaṃ khāditvā raññā bandhanāgāre bandhāpitā palāyitvā pabbajanti,
atk-s0504a:1413_1: te raññā bandhanaṃ abhinītattā rājābhinītā nāma.
atk-s0504a:1413_2: Ye pana corehi aṭaviyaṃ gahetvā ekaccesu māriyamānesu ekacce “mayaṃ sāmi tumhehi vissaṭṭhā gehaṃ anajjhāvasitvā pabbajissāma,
atk-s0504a:1413_3: tattha tattha yaṃ yaṃ buddhapūjādipuññaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0504a:1413_4: tato tato tumhākaṃ pattiṃ dassāmā”ti tehi vissaṭṭhā pabbajanti,
atk-s0504a:1413_5: te corābhinītā nāma corehi māretabbataṃ abhinītattā.
atk-s0504a:1413_6: Ye pana iṇaṃ gahetvā paṭidātuṃ asakkontā palāyitvā pabbajanti,
atk-s0504a:1413_8: Tañca kho etaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ kulaputtā mama sāsane neva rājābhinītā…pe…
atk-s0504a:1414_1: Jātiyātiādīsu tamhi tamhi sattanikāye khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti jāti,
atk-s0504a:1414_4: Ñātirogabhogasīladiṭṭhibyasanehi phuṭṭhassa santāpo anto nijjhānaṃ soko,
atk-s0504a:1414_8: Ñātibyasanādīhi eva phuṭṭhassa paridevenapi adhivāsetuṃ asamatthassa cittasantāpasamuṭṭhito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
atk-s0504a:1414_15: paññāyethāti imassa sakalassa vaṭṭadukkharāsissa paricchedakaraṇaṃ osānakiriyā api nāma paññāyeyya.
atk-s0504a:1415_0: So ca hoti abhijjhālūti idaṃ yo kulaputto “dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti pubbe cittaṃ uppādetvā pabbajito
atk-s0504a:1415_1: aparabhāge taṃ pabbajjaṃ tathārūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0504a:1415_6: Paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappoti tikhiṇasiṅgo viya caṇḍagoṇo paresaṃ upaghātavasena duṭṭhacitto.
atk-s0504a:1415_13: Pākatindriyoti yathā gihī saṃvarābhāvena pariggahaparijane olokenti asaṃvutindriyā,
atk-s0504a:1416_1: Ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagatanti pamāṇena aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ ubhato dvīsu koṭīsu ādittaṃ majjhe gūthamakkhitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1416_2: Neva gāmeti sace hi taṃ yuganaṅgalagopānasipakkhapāsakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya.
atk-s0504a:1416_3: Sace khettakuṭiyā kaṭṭhattharamañcakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa,
atk-s0504a:1416_7: Tathūpamāhanti tathūpamaṃ chavālātasadisaṃ ahaṃ imaṃ yathāvuttapuggalaṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0504a:1416_8: Gihibhogā ca parihīnoti yo agāre vasantehi gihīhi dāyajje bhājiyamāne aññathā ca bhogo laddhabbo assa,
atk-s0504a:1416_10: Sāmaññatthañcāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā pariyattipaṭivedhavasena pattabbaṃ sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti.
atk-s0504a:1416_11: Imaṃ pana upamaṃ satthā na dussīlassa vasena āhari,
atk-s0504a:1416_12: parisuddhasīlassa pana alasassa abhijjhādīhi dosehi dūsitacittassa puggalassa vasena āharīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1417_3: Tādiso hi asutaṃ sotuṃ sutaṃ pariyodāpetuṃ na sakkoti alasabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:1417_8: Sabbametaṃ bhāvino sāmaññatthassa anuppādanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1417_9: Chavālātaṃva nassatīti so tādiso puggalo yathāvuttaṃ chavālātaṃ viya kassaci anupayujjamāno eva nassati ubhato paribhaṭṭhabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:1417_11: pageva katavītikkamo dussīlo”ti tassa apāyadukkhabhāgibhāvadassanena dussīle ādīnavaṃ dassetvā tato satte
atk-s0504a:1420_6: idhekacco bhikkhu attano hatthena mayā pārutassa sugatamahācīvarassa kaṇṇe parāmasanto viya maṃ anugaccheyya,
atk-s0504a:1420_8: Pāde pādaṃ nikkhipantoti gacchantassa mama pāde pādaṃ nikkhittaṭṭhāne pāduddhāraṇānantaraṃ attano pādaṃ nikkhipanto.
