atk-s0504a:1704_0: Ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti.
atk-s0504a:1704_1: Cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1706_2: gatoti ca avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho.
atk-s0504a:1706_4: yasmā bhagavā sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya aviparītāya gato avagato,
atk-s0504a:1706_6: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:1706_7: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:1706_8: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgatoti.
atk-s0504a:1706_9: Evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā bhagavato tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1707_0: Iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhanavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha diṭṭhādiabhisambodhivasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1707_2: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1707_12: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1707_13: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1708_6: Evamettha tīhi padehi devamārabrahmehi saddhiṃ sattaloko,
atk-s0504a:1709_5: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbalokavisayassa bhagavato abhisambuddhabhāve pakāsite
atk-s0504a:1709_6: yesamevaṃ siyā “māro nāma mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī,
atk-s0504a:1709_7: brahmā pana tatopi mahānubhāvataro dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0504a:1709_9: Puthū ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno mahānubhāvā saṃvijjanti.
atk-s0504a:1709_11: kimetesaṃ sabbesaṃyeva visayo anavasesato bhagavatā abhisambuddho”ti?
atk-s0504a:1710_4: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0504a:1710_5: Evaṃ pañcahipi padehi khandhattayaparicchinne sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-s0504a:1711_0: Yasmā taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti iminā idaṃ dasseti –
atk-s0504a:1711_1: yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa “nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0504a:1711_2: taṃ sabbaṃ “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1711_3: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa “bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddo”tiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0504a:1711_7: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1712_0: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati,
atk-s0504a:1712_1: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ jānitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1712_2: Evaṃ yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1712_3: taṃ tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0504a:1712_4: Imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā appattampi atthi,
atk-s0504a:1712_8: Sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ.
atk-s0504a:1712_9: Tato eva yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0504a:1712_10: taṃ bhagavā sabbaṃ sabbākārena jānāti passati.
atk-s0504a:1712_11: Evaṃ jānatā passatā cānena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ?
atk-s0504a:1712_12: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0504a:1712_13: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0504a:1713_0: Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatīti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ,
atk-s0504a:1713_4: Iminā tathādassibhāvato tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti.
atk-s0504a:1719_3: sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0504a:1720_2: rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃ tathā āgatādiatthena
atk-s0504a:1720_3: tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato
atk-s0504a:1720_4: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati.
atk-s0504a:1720_5: Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1720_6: upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
atk-s0504a:1720_7: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ vemajjhe pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyampi,
atk-s0504a:1720_9: pacchimabodhiyampi yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsati niddisanavasena,
atk-s0504a:1720_12: Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato
atk-s0504a:1720_13: ca anupavajjaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ…pe…
atk-s0504a:1720_16: ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1720_23: Gadaattho ayaṃ gatasaddo dakārassa takāraṃ katvā,
atk-s0504a:1720_27: Tatho aviparīto āgado yassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1721_0: Yathāvādī tathākārīti ye dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā ahitāya
atk-s0504a:1721_1: dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati,
atk-s0504a:1721_3: Ye pana dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti vadati,
atk-s0504a:1721_4: te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ upasampajja vihāsi.
atk-s0504a:1721_7: Yathākārī tathāvādīti sammadeva sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammā paṭipanno sayaṃ yathākārī bhagavā,
atk-s0504a:1721_8: tatheva dhammadesanāya paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena tathāvādī.
atk-s0504a:1722_0: Abhibhū anabhibhūtoti upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0504a:1722_1: bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi,
atk-s0504a:1722_2: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0504a:1722_3: asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā.
atk-s0504a:1722_4: Tato eva sayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto.
atk-s0504a:1722_7: sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya passatīti daso.
atk-s0504a:1722_9: bhāvaññathattūpanayavasena saṅkhāre sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo cittañca vase vattetīti vasavattī.
atk-s0504a:1722_10: Ettāvatā abhibhavanaṭṭhena bhagavā attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1723_4: Teneva hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe,
atk-s0504a:1723_6: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1724_1: Sabbaloke yathātathanti tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1724_3: Sabbalokavisaṃyuttoti catunnaṃ yogānaṃ anavasesappahānena sabbenapi lokena visaṃyutto vippamutto.
atk-s0504a:1724_4: Anūpayoti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi anūpayo tehi upayehi virahito.
atk-s0504a:1725_4: Sabbaganthappamocanoti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike mocetvā ṭhito veneyyasantānepi attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanato sabbaganthappamocano.
atk-s0504a:1725_11: Atha vā paramā santīti uttamā santi.
atk-s0504a:1725_13: Yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0504a:1726_1: Sabbakammakkhayaṃ pattoti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ accantābhāvaṃ patto.
atk-s0504a:1726_2: Vimutto upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimutto.
atk-s0504a:1727_2: Taṃ namassantīti taṃ tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā devamanussā namassanti.
atk-s0504a:1728_0: Iti imasmiṃ catukkanipāte chaṭṭhe sattame ca sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1749_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0504a:1754_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
